With this improvement he will have a car in good condition so his customers travel more safely and the car is in good shape.  This will generate better income to be able to continue saving and so achieve one of his biggest dreams, to buy a new car.

loans.use: to repair the motor of his car.

loans.name: Robinson

texts.es: Robinson compró calzado deportivo, juguetes en general y víveres, con su anterior credikiva y todo lo vendió. Ahora se prepara para el siguiente credikiva, porque quiere volver a ganar dinero con esta nueva inversión y por eso responderá a sus clientes con pedidos de ropa y calzado que comprará con su nuevo crédito. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: Agradecimientos por confiar en que realizaré un buen uso del dinero y mi forma de compensar es el pago puntual”
texts.en: With his previous Kiva loan Robinson bought athletic footwear, toys in general and foodstuffs and he sold it all.  Now, he’s getting ready for his next Kiva loan because he wants to earn money again with this new investment so he will respond to customer orders for clothes and footwear that he’ll buy with his new loan.  His message to Kiva lenders is the following:  “Thanks for trusting that I will put the money to good use and I will show my appreciation by paying you back punctually.”

loans.use: to buy clothes and footwear at wholesale.

loans.name: Mekhak

texts.en:
Mekhak is 42 years old, and he lives in the city of Vanadzor. He is married and has a daughter and a son. Mekhak’s wife is unemployed; his daughter is married and she lives separately from her parents; and his son is a student at a military academy in Yerevan.   

For about eight years Mekhak has run his own business to support his family. He buys eggs and chickens from a poultry factory in the city of Arzni and distributes them to food markets and private entrepreneurs in Vanadzor, using his own truck. His brother helps him, so part of the business's income goes to Mekhak’s brother's family.

Mekhak is requesting his fifth loan from Nor Horizon. He is asking for a loan of 1,000,000 AMD to buy a large lot of eggs and chickens in order to fulfill his clients' New Year’s orders.

loans.use: to buy a large lot of eggs and chickens.

loans.name: Rashid

texts.en:
Rashid, a resident of Mombasa, Kenya, is single and owns an electrical shop. The business has been in operation for two years. He learned about Milango from his friends and joined the group to access funds for his business. 

He is applying for a loan of KES 80,000 to buy more fans, iron boxes, and other materials. Rashid intends to save the extra income from this business in order to open a workshop in the future.

loans.use: to buy more fans, iron boxes, and other materials.

loans.name: Mnatsakan

texts.en: Mnatsakan is engaged in the agricultural field. He keeps livestock and cultivates land. Agriculture is the family's main source of income, but it is barely enough to make ends meet. Mnatsakan would like to develop his farm and get more income. With the requested loan he plans to purchase sheep, barley seeds, and forage. The growth of his farm will allow Mnatsakan to increase his income and sustain his family with a prosperous life. Mnatsakan lives together with his wife and two children.

loans.use: to pay for sheep, barley seeds, and forage

loans.name: Wilson Arturo

texts.es:
El hombre que ustedes puede apreciar en la foto es el señor Wilson, un hombre que sale adelante constantemente y sueña con poder comprar un terreno para construir su vivienda propia, para lograr este sueño, Wilson se despierta cada mañana con una nueva actitud que lo incita a seguir creciendo como comerciante y persona.

Actualmente el se dedica a la venta de granos, este negocio le permite poder ganar aproximadamente S/.30 diarios, él nos confiesa que fue su hermana la que le enseñó sobre este negocio y él está muy feliz de haberlo aprendido, porque es así como se desarrolla una mejora en su calidad de vida. Gracias a los prestatarios Kiva, él podrá comprar muchos más granos y venderlo a sus principales clientes, lo mismo que le permitirá agrandar su negocio.

Él vive en Camaná, ubicada al sur del país, lugar que disfruta a diario del Océano Pacífico. Wilson es un joven trabajador y empeñoso que disfruta escuchar música durante sus tiempos libres y como bien se sabe el Perú se caracteriza por tener las comidas más deliciosas del mundo y uno de los platos que a Wilson más le gusta es el “Pato asado”.
texts.en:
The man in this photo is Mr. Wilson, a man that is constantly progressing. One of his dreams is to purchase land to build his own house. Mr. Wilson wakes up each morning with a good attitude that helps him continue growing as a businessman and a person. 
Actually, Mr. Wilson sells grain. This business allows him to earn about 30 soles a day. He told us that his sister taught him this business. He was very glad to learn the business, as it allows him to improve his quality of life. Thanks to the loans from KIVA, he was able to buy more grain and sell it to his regular customers. In this way he was able to grow his business. 
He lives in Camaná, which is located in the south of the country. This city enjoys its location next to the Pacific Ocean. Wilson is a hardworking and enterprising young man. He enjoys listening to music in his free time. He also knows that Peru is known to have the most delicious food in the world. The food he likes the most is roasted duck.

loans.use: to buy more grain and sell it.

loans.name: Andranik

texts.en: Andranik lives with his parents. He and his family earn their living from cattle breeding and land cultivation. Andranik plans to expand the farm, for which he needs financial support. With the requested loan, Andranik plans to buy pigs. Development of pig breeding will allow Andranik to increase the business income. Andranik plans to start his own family, so additional income is vital for him to sustain his family in the future.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Alek

texts.en:
Alek is a 36-year-old Lebanese man, who is single and lives with his parents and one sibling (who also works). His father works really hard to cover all his family's expenses. For this reason, Alek decided to start his own business. So, he opened his own car mechanic shop in 1993. Alek is a reputable person who is really happy with the results he has attained so far. 

Today, he is requesting a loan of $1300 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase car oil and spare parts. He says that this will facilitate his business operations and improve his work. In the future, he plans to take more Kiva loans and renovate his shop.

loans.use: to purchase car oil and spare parts.

loans.name: Hussam

texts.en:
Hussam, who is a 33-year-old young man, is married with three sons and one daughter. He is a Palestinian National Authority employee with a decent salary that is not enough to cover the family's needs, so to improve and increase his income, he works part time as an employee in a local services company. He delivers the applications to companies and houses by driving a motorcycle. He wants to improve his work by purchasing a new motorcycle, so that he can work extra hours and increase his income. 

Hussam is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing the new motorcycle. This will improve Hussam's work and increase the family's income. Hussam is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To purchase a new motorcycle.

loans.name: Maria Sara

texts.es: María, debido a la buena atención que nuestra institución le brinda, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para seguir fortaleciendo más su negocio y comprar ropa para niños, damas y caballeros, con el préstamo anterior considera que le ayudo porque compro variedad de ropa y le permitió  incrementar su inventario y a crecer en clientes y de esa forma pudo salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en: María, because of the good care that our institution provides, has decided to take out a new loan to continue strengthening her business. She will buy clothes for children, women and men. She believes the previous loan helped her because she bought a variety of clothes and it allowed her to increase her inventory and have more customers. As a result she and her family have been able to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy clothes for children, women and men.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: Patrick is 62 years old, married, and has 10 children. He owns a retail shop.  He has been in this business for six years and has employed one person. His other source of income is from farming. He describes his business environment as competitive due to many people doing the same business. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, his business has grown. He hopes to expand his business further in the future. He has applied for 100,000 Kenyan Shillings to buy maize flour, wheat flour, and soda.

loans.use: To buy maize flour, wheat flour, and soda.

loans.name: Ruben Antonio

texts.es: El señor Rubén a sus 53 años de edad es propietario de una legumbrería desde el año 2009. El señor Rubén vende sus productos cerca de su casa en una jornada de trabajo de todos los días desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m. El negocio del señor Rubén nace de la necesidad de generar los ingresos para el sustento de su casa. El señor Rubén requiere de la compra de surtido tal como frutas y verduras que le permitan mejorar la variedad de productos para cumplir con todos los pedidos. El sueño del señor Rubén es tener un sitio fijo para su legumbrería y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: At the age of 53, Rubén is owner of a fruit and vegetable store; he’s had it since 2009.  Rubén sells his products near his house during a work day that goes from 7am until 4pm.  Rubén’s store needs to generate income to support his household.  He needs to buy stock merchandise like fruit and vegetables that will create greater variety so that he can fill all his orders.  Rubén’s dream is to have a fixed site for his fruit and vegetable store and to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es: El señor Fredy a sus 36 años de edad es padre de un hijo de 7 años de edad. El señor Fredy es propietario de una tienda de abarrotes en la cual vende a otros tenderos y vecinos del sector productos tales como alimentos y bebidas enlatados o envasados, artículos de limpieza y de uso en el hogar. El señor Fredy requiere de la compra de surtido con el fin de aumentar su inventario y variedad del mismo, con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos y a la vez el bienestar de su familia. El sueño del señor Fredy es tener su negocio bien surtido y ser reconocido en el mercado.
texts.en: Fredy is 36 and father of a 7 year old son. Fredy runs a general store and sells to others in his neighborhood a variety of products such as canned foods, drinks, cleaning products and household items. Fredy seeks this loan in order to increase his store's inventory, and to improve both his income and family's well-being. His dream is to have a well-stocked business that is sought after by local residents.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Raphael

texts.en:
Raphael is 30 years old and single. He has been running a retail shop business for the last six years earning a monthly income of KES 15,000.

He is requesting his fifth loan with KADET Ltd of KES 60,000, which he will use to buy more stock of washing detergents, glue, maize flour and detergents. With the anticipated profits, he will expand his business.

His hopes and dreams are to expand his business and set up a wholesale store

loans.use: To buy washing detergents, glue, maize flour and eggs for his store

loans.name: Abel

texts.en: Abel, a 38-year-old married father of four, has been selling fruits and vegetables to earn a living for three years now. He also sells ready-made food to add to his income. Since joining Faulu Kenya, Abele has been able to save his income, and he hopes to become a wholesale supplier of fresh vegetables and fruits in his town. He has applied for a loan of 100,000 Kenya Shillings to buy more fresh vegetables and fruits.

loans.use: to  buy fresh vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: Chiziwi

texts.en:
Chiziwi, a resident of Mombasa, Kenya, is married and has one child. Having started off selling coffee with a capital of 5,000 Kenya shillings, Chiziwi now owns a hotel and also sells paraffin, businesses he has been operating for 15 years.

After learning about Milango from his friends, Chiziwi joined the group to access funds for business improvement and is now requesting a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to purchase foodstuffs for the hotel and paraffin. His main challenges are the high costs of fuel and transportation and price fluctuations.

Chiziwi will use the additional income arising from the loan to pay for his child’s school fees, and he looks forward to establishing his own business premises instead of renting and also opening up a retail shop.

loans.use: To purchase foodstuffs for the hotel, and paraffin.

loans.name: Zaven

texts.en:
Zaven is engaged in agriculture. He lives with his wife and two children. The family’s main income comes from land cultivation. Zaven would like to enlarge his business to get more income and to cover his children's educational costs. 

With the help of this loan, Zaven will pay for the construction of a glasshouse. The new glasshouse will allow Zaven to grow and sell more crops. This way, Zaven will get additional income, sustain his family and provide a stable future for them.

loans.use: to pay for the construction of a glasshouse.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 32 years old and married with two children aged six and three.

Joseph is a tailor. He has been in the business for ten years and employs two people.

Since he joined Faulu Kenya Joseph has been able to increase his sales. He has applied for a 60,000 KES loan to buy cloth, thread, buttons and a sewing machine.

He hopes to convert his business into a wholesale enterprise in the future.

loans.use: to buy cloth, thread, buttons and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 28 years old, married, and has two children. He sells used clothes to earn a living; he has had the business for two years. His other source of income is from his employment. 

Samuel describes his business environment as competitive because many people do the same business in his region. Since he joined Faulu Kenya he has been able to save his income. He hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 40,000 Kenyan Shillings to buy trousers.

loans.use: To buy trousers

loans.name: Manuk

texts.en: Manuk is a barber. To make ends meet for his family, he is also engaged in agriculture. Because of bad weather conditions, Manuk hasn't been able to harvest enough to sell, so he would like to purchase some walnuts to sell. Walnuts are in very high demand in Armenia, especially during New Year, so sales of walnuts will bring Manuk more income and an opportunity to sustain his family. He lives with his wife and children.

loans.use: To pay for walnuts to resell.

loans.name: Garun

texts.en: Garun is engaged in agriculture. He keeps cattle. Garun needs some financial investments to expand his farm. With the requested loan he plans to purchase sheep and cows. Development of the farm will allow Garun to increase the income from agriculture. This is vital for Garun, as he plans to start his own family and he will be able to insure better living conditions for them in the future. Garun lives together with his mother.

loans.use: to purchase sheep and cows

loans.name: Ronald Milton

texts.es: El señor Ronald nacido en la ciudad de Oruro de 27 años de edad, radica en la ciudad de Cochabamba hace 20 años se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en pequeño mercado ubicado en la zona sud de la ciudad también vende juguetes de forma ambulante en provincias;  su familia esta compuesta por su conyugue y su hija, actualmente vive en casa familiar de sus tíos abuelos en la  zona de villa pagador, es una persona amable y responsable , el crédito que se le otorga le ayudara a comprar mercadería para vender juguetes en la temporada navideña  así de esta manera generara ingresos para sustentar a su familia , el señor nos comenta que esta agradecido por la confianza brindada en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en:
Ronald was born in the city of Oruro. He is 27 years old. He has lived in the city of Cochabamba for 20 years. He sells groceries in a little market located in the south of the city. He also sells toys as a traveling salesperson in the provinces. 

His family is made up of his wife and daughter. Currently he lives in the family home with his uncles and grandparents in the area of Villa Pagador. He is a friendly and trustworthy person.

The money from the loan will help him to buy supplies in order to sell toys in the Christmas season and thus to earn income in order to take care of his family. The gentleman comments that he is grateful for the confidence given to him by granting his loan.

loans.use: to buy toys to sell for the holiday season

loans.name: Gelacio Sebastian

texts.es:
Gelacio es un hombre divorciado de 36 años que vive en Santo Domingo que es una de las ciudades más jóvenes del país, actualmente se ha constituido en el punto de enlace entre las región Sierra y Costa del Ecuador. Es un sitio privilegiado, no solo por la riqueza étnica, sino también por los paisajes inusitados que se pueden encontrar desde el ingreso mismo a esta bella ciudad. Santo Domingo de los Colorados pertenece actualmente a la provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, recientemente conformada.  La fiesta principal de Santo Domingo, se celebra con un movimiento intenso de visitantes, intercambio comercial y cultural. Una gran feria tiene lugar en las instalaciones de la Asociación de Ganaderos, allí se muestran y compiten los mejores ejemplares de las distintas razas y cruces que son criados en las haciendas de la región. 

Desde hace algunos años Gelacio es taxista. A pesar de ser divorciado él es responsable económicamente de sus hijos por lo que diariamente se esfuerza. Trabaja aproximadamente 12 horas al día todos los días y actualmente el requiere arreglar su vehículo que le ha presentado problemas. Por esta razón Gelacio recurrió a solicitar un crédito y así seguir trabajando por sus hijos.

La separación de su esposa ha sido dura y sin embargo el no ha descuidado a sus hijos a quienes desea ver profesionales en un futuro y gozando de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gelacio is 36 and divorced. He lives in Santo Domingo, which is one of the youngest cities in the country. Nowadays, it has become the link between the mountain and coastal regions of Ecuador. It is a privileged place, not only for ethnic richness, but also for the scenery that can be found right from when you enter this beautiful city.

Santo Domingo de los Colorados is currently part of the recently established province of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas. The main festival of Santo Domingo is celebrated by a major influx of visitors, as well as a commercial and cultural exchange.  A great exhibition takes place at the facilties of the Cattlemen's Association. There, the best examples of the various breeds and crossbreeds raised in the ranches of the region, are shown and compete.

Gelacio been a taxi operator for a few years. In spite of being divorced, he is financially responsible for his children, so he works hard every day. He works approximately 12 hours a day, every day. At this time, he needs to fix his vehicle, which has given him problems.

For this reason, Gelacio resorted to applying for a loan, so that he can continue working for his children. The separation from his wife has been difficult, however, he has not neglected his children. He wishes to see them become professionals in the future, and enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: To fix his taxi.

loans.name: Elmer Alirio

texts.es: Elmer, necesita comprar más equipo para su negocio, por eso solicitó un préstamo que le permita comparar alarmas para trabajar instalandolas a los vehículos y todo el equipo para la instalación, él quiere continuar recibiendo de estos servicios, para crecer con su negocio, puesto que ha tenido un efecto positivo con las inversiones anteriores por medio de los préstamos.
texts.en: Elmer needs to buy more equipment for his business and so he requested a loan that will enable him to buy alarms that he will install in vehicles as well as all the installation equipment. He wants to continue receiving these services so that he can grow his business as he has had positive outcomes with the previous investments he has made through loans.

loans.use: to buy alarms to install in vehicles.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen sells clothes and shoes in Mombasa town, Kenya. He is married and has one child. He first worked casually and saved some money, which he used as capital for the business. He learned of Milango from friends.

Stephen is applying for a loan of 50,000 Kenya shillings to purchase more shoes to sell. His main challenges are customers not paying on time and price fluctuations.

Stephen looks forward to owning a shop in the future. Stephen will use the extra income to purchase more goods to sell as well as to save for his child’s expenses.

loans.use: To purchase more shoes to sell

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: Daniel  de 56 años de edad vive al sur occidente de Barranquilla, con su esposa y tiene 3 hijos en las edades de 25 a 28 años. Él desde hace 35 años  se dedica  a ofrecer servicios de mecánica automotriz y desde hace 11 años emprendió su propio negocio de venta de  dulces, mecatos y servicios de llamadas telefónicas, en su propia casa. Su sueño de mejoramiento del ingreso, no se detiene y por eso quiere continuar creciendo empresarialmente; esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación, mediante el cual comprará  dulces, mecatos al por mayor, recargas telefónicas y la compra de un plan de llamadas.   Daniel es pionero de esta actividad que hoy es muy común en su sector, pero su experiencia y buen servicio genera que sus clientes prefieran sus alternativas con relación a las que ofrece su competencia. Su esposa es una mujer trabajadora, confeccionista vinculada a los programas de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y ellos reconocen lo importante que son los financiamientos en su vida empresarial. Su meta mas adelante es lograr el mejoramiento de su vivienda especialmente en lo que hace referencia a sus acabados. Su rotación de inventarios es de 11 días su ciclo operacional es de dos días y desde aquí planea el crecimiento de su in versión y gradualmente de su capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Daniel is 56 years old and lives to the southwest of Barranquilla with his wife and three children who are between the ages of 25 and 28. For the past 35 years, he has been providing automobile repair services. Daniel also has another business that he started 11 years ago selling candy, boxed lunches, and telephone services from his home. His dream is to continue improving his income. For this reason he wants to continue growing as an entrepreneur and apply for a Kiva loan, his first form of financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will use the money to buy candy and boxed lunches in bulk, rechargeable phone cards, and enroll in a calling plan.

Daniel is a pioneer in this business because now it is a very common enterprise in his area. Because of his experience and the good service he provides, his customers prefer the alternatives that he offers over that of the competition. His wife works hard as a seamstress and has participated in the programs of Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. They recognize the importance of the loans in their business life. Going forward, Daniel’s goal is to make improvements to his home with specific emphasis on the finishing touches. His product turnover period is 11 days and his operational cycle is 2 days. From this point, he plans to grow his investment and gradually increase his operating capital.

loans.use: to buy candy and boxed lunches in bulk, rechargeable phone cards, and enroll in a calling plan.

loans.name: Farhod

texts.ru: Фарход-29летний молодой человек,имеет семью и двоих детей.Клиент с высшим образованием из отдаленного района окончил университет и после практики остался работать в городе. Стаж его работы в медицинской сфере уже более 5 лет и уже он определился в своем деле.Сейчас работает в областном санитарно- эпидемиологическом станции на позиции врача-пищевика.Вместе с семьёй переехал в город и арендует квартиру,обставляя её используя наш кредит.Первый кредит Фарход получил в феврале 2010 году и уже третий раз берет кредит.Все кредиты были использованы по назначению и наша поддержка была своевременна молодой семье.Так как клиент намерен остаться в городе, он собирается купить себе квартиру и планирует в будущем получить кредит на покупку квартиры.
texts.en: Farhod is a 29-year old man, married with two children. This client has received higher education; he is originally from a remote region, and, after graduating from the university and completing his internship, he has remained to work in the city. He has over five years of experience in healthcare and is already established in his field. At present he works at the regional epidemiological station as a physician specializing in food safety. He moved into the city together with his family and rents an apartment, using our loan to furnish it. Farhod took out his first loan in February 2010, and this will be his third loan. All [previous] loans have been used as intended, and our help  proved to be very timely for the young family. Since this client intends to remain in the city, he plans to buy an apartment and obtain a future loan for this purpose.

loans.use: to buy bedroom furniture

loans.name: Nizomudin

texts.ru: Низомудин женат и имеет троих детей. Он с детства с работой скотовода и имеет опыт в скотоводстве. Раньше они жили очень бедно у них не было средств для развития своего домашнего бизнеса, с помощью финансовой поддержки родственников у которых они взяли у них долг и закупили двух голов мелкого рогатого скота, постепенно они увеличивали поголовье скота и сейчас получают стабильный доход от данного бизнеса. Данный момент она нуждается в средствах для постройки сарая для скота и покупки корма для них. А также на остальную сумму хочет купить мелкий рогатый  скот.
texts.en: Nizomudin is married and has three children.  He has been taking care of livestock since childhood and has experience in animal husbandry.  Previously, they were poor and had no money to develop their home business.  Then, with the help of relatives who lent them money, they purchased two heads of small livestock and gradually continued to increase livestock headcount.  Currently, they earn a stable income from this business.  Nizomudin needs money to build a shed for livestock and to purchase livestock feed.  He also wants to buy small livestock with the remaining amount.

loans.use: to build a shed and purchase livestock feed

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, nuevamente se decidió a obtener un préstamo, esta vez para mejorar su vivienda fortaleciendo cañerías de aguas negras, comprara tuberías para su instalación, de esa forma podrá mejorar mas su vivienda y su familia vivirá en mejores condiciones.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo mucho puesto que le ayudo  a mejorar en su negocio manteniendolo siempre surtido de mercaderia y les ayudo a sus hijos en sus estudios el cual mejoro la situación económica que tenían anteriormente.
texts.en:
Juan decided once again to obtain a loan; this time it will be to improve his house by strengthening his sewer pipes.  He will buy pipes for the installation thus improving his dwelling and his family will live in better conditions.  

The previous loan helped him very much because it helped him to improve his business by keeping it well-stocked with merchandise always and it helped his children with their schooling all of which improved their previous economic situation.

loans.use: to buy tubing for water installations.

loans.name: Mortila

texts.es:
Mortila, nuevamente se decidió a obtener préstamo, puesto que quiere seguir fortaleciendo su negocio y comprar productos de primera necesidad para ofrecerles variedad a sus clientes como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, café instantáneo, embutidos, y de esa manera podrá siempre mantener su negocio estable.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo mucho porque pudo surtir su tienda con productos nuevos y a tener más clientes y los ingresos fueron mejores y por el momento su familia ha podido salir adelante.
texts.en:
Mortila has recently decided to apply for another loan, since she wants to continue to strengthen her business by purchasing basic consumer products, so that she can offer a greater variety to her customers.  She will buy products such as: rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil, instant coffee and sausages.  In this way, she will be able to keep her business stable.

Her previous loan was a big help to her, because she was able to stock up her store with new products, have more customers, and increase her income.  Now her family has been able to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil, instant coffee and sausages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy soft drinks, chicken, rice, cooking oil, condiments, and bread

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es: A sus 41 años, el señor Gilberto desea iniciar su propio negocio de levante y venta de ganado con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida y su esposa y dos hijos de 5 y 10 años, puesto que en su actual trabajo en un cultivo de flores no es bien remunerado y necesita recuperarse de los momentos difíciles que paso cuando por la violencia de su pueblo tuvo que desplazarse a iniciar una nueva vida en otro lugar. El sueño del señor Gilberto es recuperar su hogar y brindarle a sus hijos educación y bienestar.
texts.en: Gilberto, 41, wants to start his own business raising and selling livestock, so that he can increase his income and provide a better quality of life to his wife and two children, aged 5 and 10.  This is because his current work cultivating flowers does not pay enough, and also because he needs to recover financially from a difficult period when he had to relocate his family due to the violence in his town and start a new life in another place.  Gilberto's dream is to have his own home again, and provide for the welfare and education of his children.

loans.use: to buy livestock to start a business

loans.name: Dimas Marin

texts.es:
Dimas, necesita otro préstamo porque necesita hacerle algunas mejoras a su vivienda y comprara láminas para el techo y cubrir otros gastos personales y a si su familia podrá vivir en mejores condiciones.
Dimas comenta que el financiamiento anterior le ayudo mucho, porque pudo mejorar algunas cosas en la vivienda y sostener a su familia, espera que poco a poco le pueda ofrecer una mayor comodidad en el hogar.
texts.en: Dimas needs another loan because he needs to make some home improvements and will buy roofing metal sheets for the roof; he will also cover some other personal expenses so that his family can live under better conditions.  Dimas comments that the previous loan helped him much because he was able to improve some things at home and support his family.  He hopes to gradually provide more comfort in his home.

loans.use: to buy roofing sheets and to cover some other personal expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase irons, wardrobes, fans, and dressers.

loans.name: Jamoliddin

texts.ru: Чамолиддин проживает в городе Вахдат. Ему 26 лет. Он женат. У него среднее образование. Он более восьми лет занимается торговлей. У него имеется торговая точка на рынке. Чамолидин продает конфеты и сухофрукты. Он берет кредит для увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en: Jamoliddin is a married 26-year-old man who lives in Vahdat.  He has secondary education. Jamoliddin has been engaged in sales for over eight years and has his own market stand. Jamoliddin sells candies and dried fruits.  He is taking out a loan to increase the sales turnover.

loans.use: To buy dried fruits and chocolate

loans.name: Saidkul

texts.ru: Саидкул житель района Хамадони. Возраст, 35 лет. Женат. Имеет пятерых детей. Уже три года как занимается торговлей. У него имеется магазин со смешанным ассортиментом. Он берет кредит для увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en: Saidkul is a married 35-year-old man with five children.  He lives in Hamadoni.  He has been engaged in sales for three years.  Saidkul owns a general merchandise store.  He is taking out a loan to increase the inventory of his sales items and increase turnover.

loans.use: To buy food products and other general merchandise for his store

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph, 28, is a hardworking man who hails from Kagadi, Uganda. He is the proud owner of a boutique, a business he has had for three years, having started as a bricklayer. Price fluctuations and inadequate capital are affecting the growth of his business, with which he wants to make a wholesale shop.
Joseph wants a loan to buy clothes for resale.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Sami

texts.en:
Sami is a 49-year-old man who supports a family of five members.
After his retirement, Sami opened a mini market in the first floor of his house to sell some basic food products and snacks. It has now been two years since he started the mini market, and he is serving a lot of people in the area. Now Sami has applied for a loan to purchase more food products to restock the store and be able to serve more people.

loans.use: to purchase more food products to restock his store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shirts, blouses, pants, and underwear

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more dried maize and cassava to resell.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is 41 years old. He is married to Benta and they have 4 children. He owns a motorbike, which he uses to transport goods and people. His business has been in operation for 3 years, earning him a monthly income of KES 18,000.

He has requested a loan of KES 60,000 from KADET Ltd as his 4th loan, after having repaid the previous ones successfully.  He hopes to use this amount to purchase a new motorbike for his business. He will reinvest the profits to start a poultry farm.

His dreams are to prosper in business and have a happy family.

loans.use: To purchase a new motorbike.

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es:
María, de nuevo necesita comprar mercadería para surtir la tienda de productos de primera necesidad, por eso se ha decidido a solicitar otro préstamo y comprar productos como: frijoles, aceite, azúcar, sopas instantáneas, espaguetis, salsitas; con el objetivo de tener mas variedad para ofrecerles a los clientes.
El efecto que Maria ha tenido con los prestamos anteriores son buenos, porque le ayudaron a mejorar  sus ingresos dandole mayor estabilidad al negocio, así como su familia.
texts.en: María needs to buy merchandise to stock her store again with basic staple items so she’s decided to request another loan to buy beans, oil, sugar, instant soup, noodles and sauces to have more variety available to offer her customers.  The effect that María has had with previous loans has been good because they helped her improve her income giving more stability to the business as well as to her family.

loans.use: to buy beans, oil, sugar, instant soup, noodles and sauces.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es: El  señor Alejandro nació en la localidad de la Guardia, es casado con la señora  Rufina por mas de 12 años tienen tres hijos dos niñas y un varón. El vive en la localidad de Santa Rita hace 12 años se dedica a la venta  de chatarra y también es transportista ya que cuenta con su vagoneta propia. Su esposa tiene un  pequeño taller de costura  confecciona ropa solo para mujer  en su mismo domicilio. Es cliente antiguo se encuentra pasando la 4º secuencia El crédito lo necesita para la compra de  su motor para su vehículo ya que  le quieren dar uno en oferta y no quiere perder la oportunidad, este vehículo también le ayuda a trasportar la chatarra que recolecta para llevar a un centro de acopio y después venderlo en cantidad.
texts.en:
Alejandro was born in La Guardia.  He’s been married to Rufina for more than 12 years; they have three children, two girls and a boy.  He has lived in Santa Rita for 12 years and works selling scrap; he also provides transportation with a van he owns.  His wife has a small sewing workshop where she makes just women’s clothes at home.

He is a longstanding client who is starting his 4th cycle.  He needs the loan to buy an engine for his vehicle because he is being offered one at a good price and he doesn’t want to let this opportunity pass.  This vehicle also helps him transport the scrap that he collects to take to a gathering center to be sold later in quantity.

loans.use: to buy an engine for his van.

loans.name: Samvel

texts.en:
Samvel is 60 years old, and he lives in Sevan with his wife. Samvel has three children, all of whom live separately from their parents. His wife is a teacher, but she helps Samvel in his business, selling food, household goods, and glass. Thanks to Samvel's varied assortment of products and his friendliness, he has many regular customers. Samvel supports his family with the income from his business. To increase his income, he intends to start selling construction materials.

Samvel is a five-time client of Nor Horizon. He is requesting a loan of 1,000,000 Armenian drams to buy a large lot of glass and construction materials for his business.

loans.use: to buy a large lot of glass and construction materials for his business.

loans.name: Evelyn Antonia

texts.es:
Evelyn, nuevamente invertirá en su negocio por eso ha solicitado un nuevo préstamo para incrementar los ingresos y comprar mercadería como: ropa para damas y caballeros faldas, blusas, pantalones, camisas y tendrá variedad para ofrecerles a los clientes.
Ella considera que los prestamos anteriores le ayudaron a superarse y en estos meses logro mejores ganancias y ahora vive en mejores condiciones que antes con su familia.
texts.en:
Evelyn is investing in her business once again, and for this reason she has requested a new loan to increase her income and purchase merchandise such as clothing for men and women (skirts, blouses, trousers, shirts) so she will have variety in what she offers for sale to her customers.

She considers that the previous loans have helped her to succeed.  In these months she has been able to achieve greater profits, and she now lives in better conditions with her family than she did previously.

loans.use: to purchase clothing: blouses, trousers and shirts.

loans.name: Fadi

texts.en:
Fadi is a 36-year-old Lebanese man. He’s single and lives with his parents and two working siblings. Because his family depends on him and needs his support, Fadi's father works nonstop to fulfill their demands. Fadi opened his own clothing shop in 2008. He’s a reputable person who has gained a fair number of customers so far. 

Fadi is requesting a loan of $2000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to expand his business by adding new and diverse clothing designs to his inventory.  He notes that this Kiva loan will allow him to target new customers. In the future, he plans to open an accessories department within his shop.

loans.use: to add new and diverse clothing designs to his inventory.

loans.name: Victor Anibal

texts.es:
Víctor, nuevamente solicita otro préstamo con la intención de seguir invirtiendo en su negocio y comprar más mercadería como: jugos, refrescos, gatorade y gaseosas al por mayor y repartirlo a las tiendas de sus clientes. 
Para Victor los prestamos anteriores le ayudaron porque  mejoro en sus ventas generando más ganancias y logro ayudarles a su familia con los gastos de la casa.
texts.en:
Víctor is once again requesting an additional loan, with the intention of continuing to invest in his business.  He will purchase more merchandise such as juice, soft drinks, gatorade, and sodas at wholesale, which he will distribute to the stores of his customers.

The previous loans have helped Victor, because he has improved his sales generating more earnings, and he has been able to help his family with the household expenses.

loans.use: to purchase juice, soft drinks, gatorade and sodas at wholesale.

loans.name: Youssef

texts.en: Youssef is a 44-year-old married Lebanese man. He lives with his wife and two children. He is the main income provider in his family and has all their support. He has been selling car engines for the past thirty years. He also owns a small apartment, and benefits from its rental fees. Today, he is asking to borrow $2000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase additional products for his shop, such as more engines, in order to improve his business and increase his profits. In the future, he plans to enlarge his shop and hire people to work with him.

loans.use: to purchase additional products for his shop, such as more engines

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a 45-year-old married Lebanese man. He lives with his wife and two children. With the support of his wife, he is able to fulfill his family’s needs and respond to their demands. He has been selling photocopiers for the past eleven years, and has a solid understanding of this type of machinery. His wife works at a local university. Today, he is asking for a loan of $3000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new equipment for his shop, such as scanners, ink, photocopiers, etc. He notes that this will increase his sales, and thus his profits. In the future, he plans to export his products outside the country.

loans.use: to purchase new equipment for his shop, such as scanners, ink, photocopiers, etc.

loans.name: Abbas

texts.en: Abbas is a 25-year-old single Lebanese man. He lives with his parents and two working siblings. They are all cooperating in order to cover the heavy costs of living. Despite all that, his father will always be supportive of them. As for Abbas, he has owned a mechanic shop since 2006, having been involved in this field for the past ten years.  Today, he is looking to borrow $1200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase additional spare parts for his shop. He notes that this may improve his business and allow him to attract more customers. In the future, he plans to open his own car show room.

loans.use: to purchase additional spare parts for his shop.

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es:
Luis, necesita de nuevo el préstamo para invertirlo en el negocio debido a la época de diciembre y enero, comprara mercadería como: frazadas, cortinas, Dvd, Cds, aprovechando la época de navidad y el resultado será mejor porque mejora en sus ventas.
Luis ha tenido una buena experiencia con estos prestamos pues le ayudaron para invertir en artículos de mayor venta para que el negocio sea más rentable, esto tambien ha beneficiado a su familia.
texts.en:
Luis needs a loan again, in order to invest it in his business. This is due to the December/January season. He will buy merchandise such as blankets, curtains, DVDs, and CDs, taking advantage of the Christmas season. His earnings will be better, because he is improving his sales. 

Luis has had a good experience with these loans, as they have helped him invest in better-selling items, so that the business is more profitable. This has also benefitted his family.

loans.use: To buy blankets, curtains, bedspreads and DVDs

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
José, de nuevo solicita un préstamo con el objetivo de aumentar en sus ventas y debido a la época que se vende más ofrecerles a los clientes variedad de bebidas como:licores de toda clase y calidad, de esa forma podrá ofrecerles a su clientes variedad.
El prestamo anterior le ayudo porque estableció su negocio y las ventas fueron mejores, sus ganancias mejoraron, por lo cual a ayudado a su familia con los gastos de la casa.
texts.en:
José is applying for a loan again, with the objective of increasing his sales. Because it is the season when more is sold, he wishes to offer his customers a variety of drinks, including liquor of all kinds and quality. That way, he will be able to offer his customers variety. 

The previous loan helped him, because he established his business.  Sales were better and his earnings improved, so he has helped his family with the household expenses.

loans.use: To buy liquor of all kinds and quality.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is 45 years old and married with four children. He runs a mechanic shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for 15 years and has employed two people. He describes his business environment as good because he is visited regularly by his customers. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his business. He hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 100,000 Kenya Shillings to buy car spare parts.

loans.use: To buy car spare parts

loans.name: Dick Otoniel

texts.es: Dick no compró su computador con el dinero de credikiva, porque se le presentó una oportunidad de invertir en mercancias como calzado, perfumes y sandalias, con muy buenos descuentos y la aprovechó. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva porque va a invertir nuevamente en pedidos de sus clientes, que aumentaron: ropa, calzado elegante para las fiestas de fin de año.  Él planea con las utilidades invertirlas nuevamente en mercancias y ahorrar  para comprar su computador. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: " Gracias por la ayuda de capital para inversión a una tasa menor que en el mercado y así prosperar en nuestros negocios".
texts.en: Dick did not purchase a computer with his Kiva loan because he was presented with an opportunity to invest in merchandise, such as footwear, perfume and sandals, at a very good discount and took advantage of it. He's currently requesting another Kiva loan because he wants to invest once again in orders from his growing customer base: elegant clothing and footwear for end-of-the-year parties. He plans to reinvest his profits in supplies and save so he can buy the computer. His message to Kiva lenders is as follows: "Thank you for the help with investment capital at a lower rate than the market so our businesses can prosper."

loans.use: to purchase elegant clothing and footwear for end-of-the-year parties.

loans.name: Monther

texts.en:
Monther is a 54-year-old married man who has five daughters and sons, the oldest of whom is 26 years old.
Monther runs a shop that serves take-away drinks, such as coffee and tea, mostly to passers-by and taxi and bus drivers. He has been running the business successfully for eight months. Now Monther wants to enhance the internal decor of the shop and purchase more types of drink so he can offer a range that suits everyone’s taste.

loans.use: to enhance the internal decor and purchase more types of drink.

loans.name: Faten

texts.en: Faten is a 33-year-old Lebanese man. He’s married, living with his wife and only one child who is still studying. In order to pay his child’s educational fees and cover the heavy costs of life, he decided to open his own cattle farm in 2001 after being involved in this domain for the past fifteen years. Today, he wants to borrow $2600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a pick up for his farm. In that way, he will be capable to deliver milk to the neighbor areas. In the future, he plans to open his own home made products shop

loans.use: to purchase a pick-up truck for her farm.

loans.name: Oswaldo

texts.es:
El señor Oswaldo es de la ciudad de Ica, Perú, ciudad reconocida por su flamante Pisco iqueño y aclamada como la “Ciudad del eterno Sol”, una ciudad reconocida por la agro exportación (Espárragos, Alcachofas y otros productos seleccionados), en estos últimos años se ha convertido en una de las principales ciudades donde se fomenta la inversión, luego de ser azotada terriblemente por un terremoto de 8.0 grados el 15 de Agosto del 2007, fecha que muchos ciudadanos aún recuerdan y que muchas generaciones también comentarán, es aquí donde el señor Oswaldo decidió brindar el servicio de transporte público.

Oswaldo es un hombre que se esfuerza día a día y da todo de sí para lograr sus objetivos, él tiene 57 años y un hijo de 22 años que ya no vive en casa con él. El señor Oswaldo se dedica a conducir tu propio taxi todos los días y esto le permite tener un ingreso promedio diario de S/.35.

El préstamo Kiva ayudará a Oswaldo a poder darle mantenimiento a su auto y realizará algunas reparaciones del mismo para que más adelante no tenga ningún problema con su vehículo, debido que a esta edad sería complicado obtener ayuda en horas nocturnas. El sueño del señor Oswaldo es tener un nuevo auto para generar mayores ingresos y que su hijo llegue a ser profesional.
texts.en:
Mr. Oswaldo is from the city of Ica, Perú which is known for its splendid "Pisco Iqueño" (alcoholic drink) and called the "City of the eternal sun".  The city is also known for its agro exports (asparagus, artichokes and other select products).  In the last few years it has become one of the main cities where investment is promoted after the terrible 8.0 magnitude earthquake that hit on August 15, 2007, a date which many locals remember and will talk about for generations to come.  This is where Mr. Oswaldo has a taxi business.

Oswaldo is a man who makes a daily effort to reach his goals.  He is 57 years old and has a 22-year-old son who no longer lives at home.  Mr. Oswaldo uses his own vehicle for his daily taxi business and this provides him with an average daily income of 35 PEN.

The Kiva loan will help Oswaldo carry out repairs on his vehicle and provide maintenance so it does not have problems in the future, as getting repairs attended to at night would be problematic.  Oswaldo's dream is to buy a new vehicle so he could generate more income and so his son can become a professional.

loans.use: To pay for vehicle repairs and maintenance.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es:
Teresa, de nuevo necesita  otro préstamo porque  seguirá mejorando su negocio de ropa como: blusas, faldas, vestidos, pantalones, camisas y agregar otros productos como: semillas de marañón, asi podrá tener mejores ingresos y las ventas mejoraran en este mes de diciembre.
Los financiamientos anteriores le ayudaron porque le permitió surtir su negocio y le permitió cambiar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Teresa needs a loan again because she will continue to improve her business selling clothing like blouses, skirts, dresses, pants, shirts and add other products like cashews and, in this way, be able to have better income and her sales will improve in this month of December. Previous loans helped her because they permitted her to stock her business and allowed her to change the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase cashews.

loans.name: Zablon

texts.en: Zablon is 27 years old, married with two children aged one and three. He sells clothes such as socks, handkerchiefs and inner wear to earn a living. He has been in the business for 3 years and employs one person. He joined Faulu Kenya to take care of his family. He hopes to own a wholesale shop in the future. He has applied for KES 50,000 to buy socks, inner wear and handkerchiefs.

loans.use: To buy socks, inner wear and handkerchiefs.

loans.name: Maria Gladys

texts.es: Maria Gladys tiene 58 años de edad es una señora muy trabajadora y emprendedora que ha seguido sus sueños de tener su propio negocio que es venta de mercadería en general, lo cual lo ha logrado y ha sacado a delante a sus hijos con mucho esfuerzos. Maria Gladys emprende este negocio con el objetivo de generar ingresos para la familia y apoyar a su esposo en los gastos de la casa. Maria Gladys está solicitando financiamiento para poder abastecer el negocio en la compra de ropa para damas, caballero, ropa de niño, cosméticos entre otros productos que demanden su clientela.
texts.en: Maria Gladys is 58 years old.  She is a very hard-working and entrepreneurial lady who has followed her dream of owning her own business selling general merchandise.  She has achieved this and has managed to provide for her children through a lot of hard work.  Maria Gladys started this business with the aim of making income for her family and supporting her husband with their household expenses.  Maria Gladys is requesting this loan to stock her business.  She will buy men's, women's and children's clothing; cosmetics and other products that her customers are requesting.

loans.use: to buy men's, women's and children's clothing; cosmetics and other products

loans.name: Kaingu

texts.en:
Kaingu is a married businessman living in Malindi, Kenya. He is involved in the transport business. He has been employed as a driver where he learned that the business has good returns. Kaingu joined Milango after an invitation from friends to acquire credit to buy a motorcycle; it is the only mode of transport in rural areas where the road network is inaccessible.

Kaingu is applying for a loan of 80,000 Kenyan shillings to purchase a motorcycle. The main challenge for the business is high fuel costs. Kaingu has set his sights on buying a three-wheeler (commonly referred to as a "tuktuk" in Malindi) in the future. He will save the extra income for future investments.

loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a married, 53-year-old Lebanese man living with his wife and eight children. Three of the children are still attending school while the other five are working. Unlike some other people his age, Ahmad is a hard worker who seeks a better future for his family. Since 1991, he has owned a construction business, and he continues to work on a freelance basis at his clients' request. Ahmad is seeking to borrow $2000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase wood for his business. In the future, he plans to take on bigger projects, even those outside the country.

loans.use: to purchase wood for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy quesillo (soft cheese), roast pork, flour, chicken, meats, cabbage, and tomatoes.

loans.name: Rabih

texts.en:
Rabih is a 37-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and three school-aged children. He supports his family proudly and covers their expenses. He has been working independently as a van driver for the past fourteen years and doesn’t mind working under pressure if this can help him build a strong and better future for his family. 

Today, he needs to borrow $2100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to perform the needed maintenance on his van in addition to painting and smithing. He notes that this will improve his business and allow him to attract more customers. In the future, he plans to buy a bigger van and organize tourist trips.

loans.use: to perform needed maintenance on his van in addition to painting and smithing.

loans.name: Fadi

texts.en:
Fadi is a 30-year-old single man from Marka, Amman, Jordan.

Fadi started his business by selling the mobiles prepaid cards. Then he expanded the project to include trading in mobile phones and their accessories. He now has a shop for mobile phones and is requesting a loan of 800 JD to purchase more quantities of mobile phones and their accessories for trading purposes.

Fadi is looking to be a mobile phones wholesaler so that he can distribute mobile phones outside Amman through retailers, with an aspiration of improving his family's living income and their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase more mobile phones and their accessories

loans.name: Sameer

texts.en: Saeer is a 22-year-old man from Marka, Amman, Jordan. Sameer is about to get married and he is requesting a loan of 1500 JD to finance part of his wedding expenses.

loans.use: to finance his wedding expenses

loans.name: Rosa Inocente

texts.es: Rosa, nuevamente solicita un préstamo con el objetivo de invertir en su negocio de productos de granos básicos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, sopas instantáneas, consomés, de esa manera podrá tener variedad y atenderá mejor a sus clientes, los financiamientos anteriores le ayudaron porque  estableció su negocio y con las ganancias a podido pagar los créditos y ha apoyado a su familia con los gastos de la casa.
texts.en: Rosa applies again for a loan to invest in her business, where she sells staples such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, instant soups and consommés. In this way she can have variety and will better serve her customers. Her previous loans helped her because she set up her business and the profits enabled her to pay off the loans and support her family with household expenses.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, instant soups and consommés.

loans.name: Edilson Vladimir

texts.es:
Edilson, debido a la buena atención de nuestra institución  y a la necesidad de seguir trabajando con su negocio, solicita un nuevo prestamo, ya que necesita comprar ganado para engordarlo y venderlo a buen precio.
La idea de Edilson es mejorar con el apoyo de los prestamos ya que hasta la fecha ha obtenido una buena ayuda, porque pudo cubrir algunos gastos de su familia y las condiciones de vida cambiaron.
texts.en: Edilson, thanks to the good service provided by the microfinance institution PADECOMSM and the need to continue working in his business, applies for a new loan because he needs to buy cattle to fatten and sell at a good price. Edilson's idea consists in improving his business with the loans because so far they proved to be a good help. He was able to cover some household expenses and the family's living conditions have changed.

loans.use: to buy cattle to fatten and sell.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es:
Oscar, solicita de nuevo otro préstamo, con el objetivo de seguir trabajando en su negocio y comprar 2 cerdos y 3 terneros para el destace y vender la carne a los clientes, de esa forma tendrá mejores ingresos y asi ayudar siempre a su familia.
Los prestamos le ayudaron porque siempre ha mantenido su negocio estable y de esa forma ha logrado contribuir con los gastos de su familia.
texts.en:
Oscar is requesting a new loan to carry on with his activity by buying 2 pigs and 3 calves to butcher and sell their meat to his customers. This way he will earn a better income and he will therefore be able to continually help his family.
The loans have been of great help for him because he has succeeded in always keeping his activity steady and in contributing to his family’s expenses.

loans.use: To buy 2 pigs and 3 calves to butcher.

loans.name: Juan  Carlos

texts.es: El Joven Juan nació en la localidad de el torno vive en la zona Bibosi,  el se dedica a la compra y venta de moto por mas de un año  viaja a montero  por el lado de minero ya que de  ese lugar lo compran  mas  barato, también es moto taxista pero recién a empezado hace dos meses, es soltero no tiene mujer ni hijos vive en la casa de su hermano, junto a su madre quien es la señora Mercedes, el es muy joven y trabajador con ganas de superación esta es su única actividad con la que mantiene a su mama,  es primera vez que esta sacando crédito lo necesita para la compra de una motocicleta ya que este fin de semana quiere viajar para  realizar la compra de dicha moto,  ya que en este  mes hay mucha demanda de venta de moto
texts.en:
The young Juan was born in the town of El Torna and lives in the Bibosi zone. He has made a living buying and selling motorcycles for more than a year. He travels to the mining side of Montero as one can buy them cheaper there. He is also a motorcycle-taxi driver, but he recently started two months ago. 

He is single and does not have a wife or children. He lives in his brother's house together with his mother, Mercedes. He is very young and a hard worker with a desire to get ahead. This is his only business, with which he supports his mother. 

This is the first loan he has taken. He needs it to buy a motorcycle. This weekend he wants to go to buy this motorcycle as there is a lot of demand for motorcycle sales this month.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy tools for his business

loans.name: Fouad

texts.en:
Fouad is a 49-year-old married man and the father of two children. Owning a grocery store since 1999 gave him a special experience and a wide knowledge of his customers’ needs. That's why he is always aware of which goods are highly requested.

Fouad is intending to improve his business through increasing his merchandise with special Christmas candies and sweets. He also sells toys and gadgets and he intends to improve his stock in these, too. That's why, for the first time, he is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua.

Fouad hopes this loan will reflect positively on his social and financial situation and provide the best healthy living to his family.

He also hopes to expand his business more and more through moving to a larger shop.

loans.use: to increase his merchandise with special Christmas candies.

loans.name: Carlos Ruben

texts.es:
Carlos, vive con su esposa y un hijo, él se dedica a la venta de gas y bebidas gaseosas, además vende helados: sorbetes, paletas, conos, estos negocios los tiene en su casa de habitación, también es empleado como vigilante en un juzgado de la ciudad.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de gas propano, gaseosas, y diversidad de sorbetes, esta compra le ayudara para mejorar el negocio y surtirlo, fortaleciéndolo para aumentar las ventas.
El propósito de Carlos es mejorar el negocio y poco a poco ir mejorando su vivienda.
texts.en:
Carlos lives with his wife and son.  He sells [propane] gas and soft drinks, and also frozen treats: sorbets, popsicles, and cones out of his home.  He also works as a security guard in a city courtroom.

He is asking for this loan to buy propane gas and various types of sorbets.  This will help him improve his business, stock it, and strengthen it so that he can increase his sales.  Carols wants to improve his business and home little by little.

loans.use: to buy propane gas and sprbets.

loans.name: Ana Elsa

texts.es:
Ana, de nuevo solicita otro préstamo con el propósito de seguir invirtiendo en su tienda de productos de primera necesidad como: arroz, azúcar, frijoles, maíz, aceite, sopas instantáneas, café instantáneas, de esa manera podrá tener variedad para ofrecerles a sus clientes.
Los prestamos anteriores le ayudaron porque estableció su negocio y logro agregar otros productos nuevos y a su familia ha podido ayudarles con los gastos de la casa.
texts.en: Ana is requesting another loan in order to continue investing in her store, where she sells staple goods like rice, sugar, beans, corn, oil, instant soups, and instant coffee. This way, she will be able to have a variety of products to offer her customers. The previous loans helped her to establish her business and add new products, so she has been able to help her family with household expenses.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, beans, corn, oil, and instant soups

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es: Pedro  de 58 años convive con Cirila de 45 años, con quien tiene 2 hijos que son el fruto de esta relación. Juntos habitan en el centro poblado de Canayre del distrito de LLochegua. Pedro es agricultor, desde muy joven aprendió esta actividad de sus padres. Actualmente cultiva cacao, maíz y arroz, sobre su propia parcela agrícola que se encuentra dentro de su distrito. Sus productos son comercializados en el mercado central de su ciudad. Nos comenta asimismo que años atrás no tenía acceso de transporte a sus cultivos y eso le generaba mucho esfuerzo y tiempo para poder trasladar sus productos, pero ahora son los mismos acopiadores recogen sus productos. Pedro está contento y esto es gracias al esfuerzo y dedicación que uno puede lograr lo que desea, por tanto desea tener un nuevo negocio ques es una tienda de abarrotes. En un futuro desea abrir una tienda de abarrotes para a si tener otros ingresos. Este será su tercer credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente en el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra productos de primera necesidad para empezar un nuevo negocio.
texts.en:
Pedro is 58 years old and lives with Cirila, who is 45 years old, with whom he has 2 sons. Together, the live in the town of Canayre, in the district of Lochegua. Pedro is a farmer. From the time he was very young, he learned this way of making a living from his parents. He currently cultivates cacao, corn, and rice on his own parcel of agricultural land, which is located in his district. His products are sold in the central market of his city. He tells us that years back he didn’t have access to transportation for his crops and that created a lot of work for him and it took a lot of time to transport his products. But now the buyers themselves come and pick up the products. 

Pedro is happy and this is because with effort and dedication one can achieve what one wishes for; he wishes to have a new business, which would be a small grocery store. In the future he hopes to open a grocery store so he can have additional income. This will be his third loan with Microfinanza Prisma and he pledges to make his repayments punctually. With the PEN 3,000.00 he will buy basic products of daily use to begin his new business.

loans.use: to buy basic products of daily use to start his new grocery store

loans.name: Husein

texts.en:
Husein is a 44 year-old married man, the father of two children. He has worked as a taxi driver since 1999.  This is his only business and source of living, that's why he works hard to improve his business, to provide his family with a secure and healthy living.

Husein needs to do maintenance on his car, that's why he is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua.  This is his first experience, and he hopes it might lead to another loan, which would be invested in buying another car to expand his business through renting cars to tourists in the high season.

loans.use: To do necessary mechanical service on his car

loans.name: Misael

texts.es:
Misael, se ha decidido nuevamente por un préstamo para invertirlo en su negocio de ropa, ya que quiere surtir más su negocio y por la temporada de diciembre y comprar más mercadería faldas, blusas, pantalones, camisas y ropa interior, por la demanda de los clientes.
El está muy contento porque los prestamos anteriores pues le ayudaron a crecer en sus ventas y ha podido ayudar a su familia que es lo mas importante.
texts.en:
Misael has decided to ask for another loan to invest in his clothing business because he wants to supply his business for the December season and to buy more skirts, blouses, pants, shirts and underwear, to meet the request of his customers.

He is very happy because the previous loans helped his business sales to increase and he was able to help his family and that is the most important thing.

loans.use: to buy skirts, blouses, pants, shirts and underwear

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Loubnan

texts.en:
Loubnan is a 43-year-old married man and father of three beautiful children. His whole life, he has sought to make them happy. 

Loubnan has owned a mobile shop for the past 15 years. During this time, he has worked hard to improve and update his business with the best mobile phones and prepaid cards.

Most of his customers are loyal to him because of the special customer service he provides them. To keep his customers happy, he works hard on providing them the best prices ever. That's why he insists on buying everything he needs in cash to take advantage of special discounts or special offers. 

For this reason, Loubnan is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua. He hopes this cooperation will bring successful future relationships.

loans.use: to buy mobile phones and prepaid cards.

loans.name: Muntaha

texts.en:
Muntaha is a 35-year-old married woman from Sahab, Jordan and a mother of five children.

Muntaha has a home-based grocery store and she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase new quantities of goods to sell. Muntaha is looking to improve her family's income with an aspiration of improving their living conditions.

Due to cultural issues, Muntaha did not wish to be photographed. The man in the photo is Muntaha's husband.

loans.use: to purchase new quantities of goods to sell.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 26-year-old Lebanese married man who lives with his wife and child. He’s doing his best to offer them a good standard of living. For that reason, he decided to open his own home products shop in 2005 and is looking forward to grow his business. 

He sells high-tech products at fair prices which make his customers loyal to him. Today, he’s asking to borrow $2,500 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to buy added supplies for his shop such as refrigerators, televisions, plastic item and many others. He’s sure that buying these new supplies will help him earn a superior income. In the future, he plans to work as a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy added supplies for his shop such as refrigerators, televisions, plastic item and many others.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 26-year-old single man from Al Hussein, Amman, Jordan. He has a barber shop and he is requesting a loan of 800 JD to purchase an additional chair for his barber shop.

Ahmad is looking to expand his shop and employ other people to assist him.

An aspiration of Ahmad's is to finish his house so he can get married.

loans.use: to purchase an additional chair for his barber shop.

loans.name: Kawthar

texts.en:
Kawthar is a 41-year-old married woman from Al Hussein, Amman, Jordan and a mother  of four children.

Kawthar sells accessories and cosmetics and decorated flowers that she makes. She is requesting a loan of 1000 JD to purchase raw materials and accessories.

Kawthar is looking to improve her business by adding more lines to trade in.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials and accessories.

loans.name: Ebtesam

texts.en:
Ebtesam is a 30-year-old single woman from Baqa'a, Jordan. She sells blankets and she is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase more blankets to sell.

Ebtesam is looking to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase blankets to sell.

loans.name: Gergess

texts.en:
Gergess is a 50-year-old Lebanese man who lives with his wife. They're both working together to fulfill their needs. His wife opened her own bakery shop two years ago. As for him, he had ten years of experience as a wholesaler until he decided to open his own fruits and vegetables shop. 

Today, he's asking to borrow $1300 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase a bigger quantity of fruits and vegetables for his shop. In that way, he will be capable of getting higher returns. In the future, he plans to export products outside the country.

loans.use: to purchase a bigger quantity of fruits and vegetables for his shop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase the needed quantity of products to meet his customers' demands.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph lives in Kongowea, Kenya. He is married and has one school-going child. He was introduced to Milango by his friends. Joseph owns a public service vehicle and he uses it to transport people and goods within the town. He has run the business for eleven years.

Joseph is applying for loan of KES 90,000 to repair his van. His main challenge is police harassment. He plans to start other businesses in the future. Joseph will use the extra income from this loan to improve his standard of living.

loans.use: To to repair his van.

loans.name: Naser

texts.en: Naser is a single 20-year-old Lebanese man. He lives with his parents and seven siblings, four of whom are working. He has three years of experience in the construction field and works on his own. He’s an expert in his field and knows very well how to please his customers. Today, he needs to borrow $1,600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to renew his construction equipment. This loan will facilitate his business operation and augment his revenues. In the future, he plans to take projects outside the country and serve a wider range of clients.

loans.use: to renew his construction equipment

loans.name: Munirhon

texts.ru: Мунирхон молодой человек 24 лет, неженат, и живет с родителями. Мунирхон водитель городского маршрутного такси. Узнав в 2009 году про программу кредитования Арванда, он стал нашим клиентом и каждый свой кредит использует для своей машины. На прошлый кредит он обновил салон автомашины и чехлы сидений. А на получаемый кредит хочет провезти полный тщательный ремонт мотора маршрутки. Из-за сильных морозов ему необходим этот ремонт. На снимке Мунирхон возле своей автомашины.
texts.en: Munirhon is a 24 year-old young man, who is single and lives with his parents.  He is a driver of a municipal fixed-route taxi.  Having learned about the Arvand financing program in 2009, Munirhon became our client and have used each one of his loans for his car.  He used his last loan to update the car interior and seat covers.  And he wants to use this loan to make full and thorough repairs of his taxi's engine.  He must do these repairs due to severe frosts.  The photograph shows Munirhon next to his car.

loans.use: to make repairs to his taxi

loans.name: Jorge Humbreto

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre trabajador que tiene muchas aspiraciones en los años próximos de prosperar en su pequeña tienda ya que tiene una familia conformada de dos hijos y su esposa. 

Comenzó con el negocio vendiendo pequeñas cosas con su esposa poco a poco comenzó a tener ingresos. Ahora el trabaja en su tienda con su esposa medio tiempo ya que también es chofer de un bus.  

Tiene muchas aspiraciones por eso quiere continuar su tienda para darle una mejor vida a sus dos hijos. Por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar vivieres para la tienda como arroz, aceites, bebidas, granos etc.
texts.en:
Jorge is a hardworking man who has many goals for the coming years for his little store to prosper as he has a family that is comprised of two children and his wife. 
He began his business selling little things with his wife, and little by little they started to make a profit. Now he works part time in the store with his wife as he is also a bus driver.
He has many goals, and so he wants to keep his store going so that he can give a better life to his two children. For this reason, he wants a loan to buy groceries for his store such as rice, oil, drinks, grains, etc.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, drinks, and grains.

loans.name: Leonard

texts.en:
Leonard lives in Kongowea, Kenya. He operates three retail shops, a business he began eight years ago. He is married and has one school-going child. He was introduced to Milango by his friends.
  
Leonard is applying for a loan of 60,000 Kenya shillings (KES) to purchase more retail stock for the businesses. The challenge Leonard faces is the high cost of retail stock, which is beyond the reach of most of his clients. He looks forward to establishing a mini wholesale store in the future.

loans.use: To purchase more retail stock, such as salt, sugar, and flour.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a 38-year-old businessman who is married to Patricia, a farmer. They are blessed with three children aged 8, 6 and 2 years. He has been running a retail shop for the past 12 years with a monthly income of KES 30,000, which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his second loan term with KADET after repaying the previous loan successfully. Patrick will use the loan amount to buy more stock of sugar, rice and cooking oil for his shop. With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. 

He hopes to open a beauty salon for his wife, which will help them improve the living standards of their family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of sugar, rice and cooking oil for his shop

loans.name: Josphat

texts.en:
Josphat is 31 years old, married to Roseyle, and blessed with 3 children. For the past 12 years, he has bought and sold milk in his local trading centre, earning a monthly income of KES 10,000. 

He is requesting his seventh loan with KADET Ltd and has successfully paid back the previous loans. He will use the new loan of KES 70,000 to pay his milk suppliers. He will use the profits to purchase a motorbike to use to supply milk to his customers. 

His hopes are to grow his business and to look after the welfare of his family.

loans.use: To pay his milk suppliers.

loans.name: Rudik

texts.en:
Rudik is 34 years old. He lives in the city of Ijevan with his wife and two small children: his 6-year-old son and 3-year-old daughter. His wife doesn’t work: she stays at home and takes care of the children.

In 2004 Rudik started his own business: selling spare parts for cars. In the beginning, he only brought spare parts from Georgia to fulfill his clients’ orders. Then Rudik rented a shop where he sells spare parts, while he continues to fulfill his clients’ special orders. He brings the parts from Georgia by himself, which allows him to sell his merchandise relatively cheaply, therefore, attracting more clients. 

Rudik’s business allows him to support his family. He is requesting a 1,000,000 AMD loan to buy winter tire casings and different spare parts to resell.

loans.use: to buy winter tire casings and spare parts to resell.

loans.name: Transito Alberto

texts.es: Transito Alberto de treinta y siete años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y sus hijos. El posee una venta de jarrones y otras obras artesanales es muy conocido por la zona pues su trabajo es muy artístico, bonito, de excelente calidad y sobre todo a muy buen precio, se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente y no quiere decepcionar los,  quiere abastecer mas su negocio con las artesanías que realiza, para siempre estar adelante de la competencia; Transito es un hombre de visión a futuro su mayor pasatiempo es trabajar,  piensa que la clave del éxito depende sólo de lo que podamos hacer de la mejor manera posible. El sabe que tiene un don  y quiere aprovecharlo es  por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar arcilla, pintura, y barniz. Transito Alberto tiene la esperanza que de esta forma podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y una mejor calidad de vida para su familia,
texts.en: Transito Alberto is 37 and lives with his wife and children. He sells vases and other decorative items and is well known in the area.  His artisanry is considered very artistic, beautiful, of good quality and inexpensive.  He has a good client following and wishes to create and stock more muy artisanal objects to stay ahead of his competitors. Transito is a man with a vision and believes in hard work as the key to success. He knows his talents and for this reason seeks a credit from INTEGRAL to buy clay, paint and varnish to support his business. Transito Alberto has every hope of providing a bright future for his family.

loans.use: clay, paint and varnish

loans.name: René Antonio

texts.es: René Antonio de 54 años de edad, habita en casa propia en la cual ha establecido su negocio. El Señor René vive solo y ha trabajado duramente para salir adelante y ganarse el pan de cada día.
