Hassan’s business is developing, and he needs extra capital to improve it. He has applied for a 1200 USD loan from Kiva’s partner Al Majmoua in order to buy special computer accessories and spare parts to build his business.

Hassan hopes to open a big internet café. He wants to be sure teenagers aren't spending their free time developing bad habits but in useful, educational and healthy activities.

loans.use: to buy special computer accessories and spare parts.

loans.name: Francisco Mario

texts.es:
Francisco, está motivado por solicitar nuevamente un préstamo, el considera que con los aportes que se le brinda ha crecido en su negocio, manteniendo satisfecho a los clientes, actualmente comprara blusas formales, de fiesta, camisetas, camisas formales, faldas y pantalones.
Espera realizar buenas ventas, ofrecer a los clientes y que estos muestren gratitud para adquirir sus productos.
texts.en:
Francisco is excited to request a new loan because he considers this support to be a great help in growing his business and keeping his customers satisfied. He currently sells formal party blouses, t-shirts, formal shirts, skirts, and trousers.

Francisco hopes to generate good sales and offer variety to his customers, who express their gratitude by purchasing his products.

loans.use: to buy blouses, shirts, skirts, and trousers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as toys, purses, shoes and clothing.

loans.name: Bakhtiyor

texts.ru: Бахтиёр-33летний молодой человек,с высшим образованием инженера-строителя,работает по специальности.Продаёт отделочные материалы на центральном рынке.Ассортимент его товаров очень большой и пользуется большим спросом, торгует на арендованном магазине сам и развивает свой бизнес.Свою деятельность он начал создавая бригаду рабочих по строительным и отделочным работам и ремонтировал дома,квартиры и офисы на заказ,этим зарабатывал и кормил свою семью несколько лет.Имел постоянных клиентов по покупке красок и материалов и решил открыть дополнительное дело-торговля строительными материалами.Он совместил два дела-он может реализовать свои материалы на свои заказы по ремонту квартир и домов и это обходится ему дешевле.Когда он открыл свой магазин по продаже стройматериалов,он получил кредит в маленькой сумме из банка  и начал бизнес.Дела пошли хорошо и Бахтиёр расширял свой товарооборот.Много работал с кредитными организациями и не нарушал процедуры.До инфляции он кредитовался в иностранной валюте и прогорел и после инфляции с декабря 2009г.он попробовал получить кредит в национальной валюте и обратился к нам.Со слов клиента наш кредит очень своевремен для него и очень помог ему в улучшении его семейных обстоятельств.На очередной кредит он намерен закупить оптовую партию герметики и красок по низкой цене.
texts.en: Bakhtiyor is a 33 year-old young man, who has a higher education degree in construction engineering and works in his field.  He sells painting and decorating materials at the central market.  He has a wide selection of merchandise that is in high demand.  He sells at a leased store by himself and develops his business.  Bakhtiyor started his business by putting together a team of workers, specializing in construction and decoration work, and worked on houses, apartments and offices repair orders.  He earned a living through this work and provided for his family for several years.  Because he had regular clients, who purchased paint and materials, he decided to open an additional business of selling construction materials.  Bakhtiyor combined both businesses since he could sell his merchandise for his own orders to repair apartments and houses, making it more profitable for him.  When he opened his construction materials store, he obtained a small loan from a bank and started his business.  Business was going well, and Bakhtiyor increased his goods turnover.  He worked a lot with lending organizations and never violated procedures.  Prior to the inflation, he obtained financing in international currency, but got burned.  So, since the inflation in December of 2009, he tried to obtain a loan in the national currency and came to us.  According to the client's words, our loan was very timely for him and helped him a lot in improving his family affairs.  Bakhtiyor plans to use this loan to purchase a wholesale inventory of sealants and paint at a low price.

loans.use: to purchase sealants and paint wholesale

loans.name: Imad

texts.en:
Imad is a 38-year-old Lebanese single man living with his parents. His father is the main income provider in the family, and Imad is ready to help whenever they need it.
 
As for Imad, he started his own business as a taxi driver in 2004. He has gained a fair number of customers so far and is looking forward to growing his business. Today, he asks to borrow $1,200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to perform needed maintenance on his car. This loan will allow him to carry on his job in a proper way. 

In the future, Imad plans to buy a van and serve as many customers as possible.

loans.use: to perform needed maintenance on his car.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.en:
Nelson is 27 years old, married with two children aged two and four. 

He sells maize and beans to earn a living. He also runs a barber shop to earn extra income. He has been in the business for four years and describes his business environment as good because their is limited competition. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya he has been able to save his income. He hopes to financially stable in the future. He has applied for a loan of 70,000 Kenya Shillings to buy maize and beans.

loans.use: To buy maize and beans.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is 29 years old, married with two children aged one and four. 

He sells used clothes to earn a living and has been in the business for six years. He describes his business environment as busy because many customers visit him daily. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to expand his business. He hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for a loan of 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Munyao

texts.en:
Munyao is 44 years old and is married with two children ages 12 and 18. For the past five years, he has run a laundry business and he employs one person. He describes his business environment as competitive because many people are in the same business. Since he joined Faulu Kenya he has been able to expand his business. 

Munyao is requesting a 40,000 KES loan to buy a dryer. He hopes to continue to expand his business in the future.

loans.use: to buy a clothes dryer

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en: Khaled is a 25-year-old single man living with his parents. His father is the one responsible for covering the heavy life expenses. Despite his young age, he decided to take some responsibilities off of his father and start his own business. For this reason, he opened his own butchery in 2007. He’s a reputable person and has loyal customers. Today, he’s asking for a loan of $1,500 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to expand his shop and change the interior design.  By doing this, he will be able to further develop his business and increase sales. In the future, he plans to raise cattle and start a dairy products trading business.

loans.use: expand his butcher shop and change its interior design.

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en: Hussein is a 33-year-old married man living with his wife and two children who are still attending school. He’s doing the best he can to support his family and offer them a decent way of living. He has been working as a car painter since 1998 and has his own garage. Today, he’s requesting to borrow $2300 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to buy the needed quantity of car paints for his shop. This will keep him up to date and allow him to present new paint colors to his customers. In the future, he plans to open a bigger garage where he can serve more clients.

loans.use: to buy the needed quantity of car paints for his shop.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en: Charles is 49 years old. He is married and has four children. To earn a living, he sells clothes.  Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has managed to grow his business with his previous loans.  He works hard in his business to provide for his family. Charles has requested a loan of 40,000 Kenyan shillings to buy clothes for resale.

loans.use: To buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Norman  David

texts.es: Norman, de 52 años de edad, originario de León, le da las gracias a los prestamistas de Kiva por haber confiado y ayudado a progresar su negocio pues lo utilizo para comprar jugos gaseosas, agua y compra de herramientas para sus trabajos en refrigeración. El expresa que hubo cambios muy positivos para su negocio a pesar de la difícil situación económica. Ahora el esta solicitando un segundo crédito para mejoramiento de su vivienda y herramientas para su barbería y reparación de freezer. Pues el desea salir adelante con su negocio y brindarle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Norman is 52 years old and a native of Leon. He thanks Kiva lenders for having confidence in him and helping him make progress with his business. He used his first loan to purchase juices, soft drinks, water and tools for his work on refrigerators. He says there have been many positive changes with his business despite the difficult economic situation. He is now requesting another loan to make improvements to his home and to purchase supplies for his barber shop and his refrigerator repair business. He desires to keep gaining ground with his business and provide a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to make improvements to his home and to purchase supplies for his barber shop and his refrigerator repair business.

loans.name: Milner Yuri

texts.es:
El señor Milner es un hombre de 33 años, lamentablemente su esposa lo abandonó y el solo es el que se dedica al cuidado de su hijo de 15 años, muchacho que ya está por culminar el quinto grado de secundaria y sueña con estudiar Administración de Empresas con la finalidad de ayudar a su padre a mejorar su pequeño negocio, es así como está muy unida familia desea continuar saliendo adelante y mejorar sus ingresos para juntos ofrecerse una mejor calidad de vida.

Milner tiene una bodega en donde vende a diario platos de comida, gaseosas, abarrotes y cervezas para generar los ingresos necesarios para ahorra y cumplir el sueño de su hijo, actualmente ambos viven en la ciudad de Pisco.

Con la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, Milner podrá desarrollar la nueva idea de negocio que tiene, la misma que consiste en comprar una fotocopiadora, este apoyo podrá permitir que tenga un ingreso extra y así llegue a juntar el dinero que necesita para que su hijo inicie su carrera de Administración de Empresas. Su sueño es poder tener un local propio, cumplir siempre con sus obligaciones del hogar.
texts.en:
Milner is a 33 year old man.  Sadly, his wife abandoned him, and he is the only one who cares for his 15 year old son.  His son is about to finish his fifth year of high school and hopes to study Business Administration.  The boy's goal is to help his father to improve his small business.  Since the family is very tight, he desires to continue moving ahead and improving their income so that he can provide a better quality of life for them together.

Milner has a grocery store in which he sells dishes of food, sodas, groceries, and beer on a daily basis to earn the necessary income to save and carry out his son's dream.  Currently, they both live in the city of Pisco.

With the help of the Kiva lenders, Milner will be able to develop the new business idea that he has.  This idea consists of buying a copy machine.  This support will allow him to have extra income and therefore be able to round up the money that he needs so that his son will be able to start his career in Business Administration.  His dream is to be able to have a location of his own, and to always fulfill his home obligations.

loans.use: to buy a copy machine

loans.name: Ahlam

texts.en: Ahlam, 34 years old, is a married lady with four children. Ahlam has been working at her house for the last five years buying large quantities of baby pampers and tissues and repackaging them into smaller quantities to sell. She then added another line to her home-based retail business selling clothes. Now Ahlam is applying for a loan to buy more products in hopes that she can open an independent store separated from her house.

loans.use: To add more products to what she sells

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en: After his retirement from the military, Mohammad, 40 years old, opened a small food market with his wife Abeer, 36 years old, in their neighborhood.It has been almost two years now since they launched their business where they sell food products and some cleaning products and detergents. Now Abeer has applied for a loan to bring in more missing products for their store and improve the shelves where they show their goods. Because Abeer is a conservative person, she asked her husband Mohammad to appear in the photo instead.

loans.use: to add more goods to their food store

loans.name: Niveen

texts.en:
Niveen is a 35-year-old married lady. She started her own small business at home selling clothes five years ago, but could not expand for financial and other reasons. Now Niveen has decided to dedicate more of her time to improve the business. She wants to open her own clothes shop in the market so she can attract more people than at her house.
Niveen has applied for a loan so she can look for a store for rent. She will then be able to move all the goods she is selling at home to the store.

loans.use: to rent a store where she can display the goods she sells.

loans.name: Maha

texts.en:
Maha is a 46-year-old lady who has six sons and daughters. For the last two years, Maha has been buying home products to sell to other housewives.
Now Maha wants a loan to expand her business by purchasing more home products for resale, such as pans, trays, and other items.

loans.use: to purchase more home products to sell.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan de 62 años vive en la ciudad de Barranquilla con su esposa y tiene 4 hijos en las edades de 32 a 39 años. Desde hace 27 años cuando llegó a la ciudad de Barranquilla, procedente del departamento del Magdalena y con sus ahorros compró una casa emprendió en esa esquina su propio negocio de ventas de frituras y comidas corrientes y allí empezó a irle muy bien hasta la presente, pues la llamada “esquina caliente” ha cobrado más importancia porque allí agregó refrescos y bebidas y con ello ha logrado el sostenimiento de su hogar, pues se ha convertido en la “Columna vertebral de sus ingresos” como él mismo lo sostiene. Su meta más adelante es convertirse en un punto estratégico donde no solo se venda alimentos, sino que sea un espacio de integración familiar y de diversión sana. En la actualidad Juan está aplicando a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará cervezas por cajas, para esperar el año nuevo bien surtido de lo que a sus clientes les gusta en las fiestas para finalizar el año :  las bebidas y los refrescos.
texts.en:
Juan is 62 years old, and he lives in the city of Barranquilla with his wife.  He has four children between the ages of 32 and 39.  He came from the Magdalena department to the city of Barranquilla 27 years ago.  He bought a house with his savings, and on that corner he started his own business selling fried food and fast food.  From then on it started to go very well for him.

His business is called “Esquina Caliente” (Hot Corner).  It has become more substantial because he has added refreshments and drinks.  With that he has managed to support his household.  It has become the “backbone of his income” as he maintains it by himself. 

His goal for later on is to convert it into a strategic point where he sells not only food, but that it becomes a space for family unification and healthy diversion.

Juan is currently applying for a Kiva loan, his first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  He will use the loan to buy cases of beer in order to be well-stocked while awaiting the New Year.  He wants to be stocked with what his customers like for the end of the year festivities, drinks and refreshments.

loans.use: to buy cases of beer to be well-stocked while awaiting the New Year.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 40-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and three school-aged children. He’s the only breadwinner for his family and they really depend on him. He has been working as a school bus driver since 2009 and has his loyal customers. 

Today, he needs to borrow $1100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to repair his bus’s engine and also its gearbox, otherwise he may lose his loyal and trusty customers. This Kiva loan will allow him transport children safely.  In the future, he plans to organize trips all over the country during his free time.

loans.use: to repair his bus’s engine and also its gearbox.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 34 years old, married to Teresia, and they are blessed with one child. He has been selling timber for the past three years with a monthly income of Kes 10,000 which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his fourth loan with KADET Ltd of Kes 100,000. He will use the loan to buy more stock  of timber. With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. 

His hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and venture into farming which will improve his income.

loans.use: To buy more timber to stock.

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
Hussein is a 47-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and four children. Three of them are still attending school while the other one is working. 

After finding it hard to cover his children’s educational fees plus his family expenses, Hussein decided to double his effort ant take on more projects as he works on a free-lance-basis. He started his own business as a painter in 1988. Today, he has the intention to borrow $1600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to buy added paint in order to be able to start his new project or else he won’t be capable of carrying on his work properly. In the future, he plans to open his own paint shop.

loans.use: to buy added paint in order to be able to start his new project.

loans.name: Alikana

texts.en:
Alikana is 35 years old and married with two children, 6 and 8. He runs a motorbike transport business to earn a living, and he also runs a  retail shop business to earn extra income. He has been in business for seven years and has employed one person. He describes his business environment as good because there is limited competition. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya he has been able to save money. He hopes to expand his retail shop to a wholesale one in the future. He has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy motorbike spare parts.

loans.use: To buy motorbike spare parts.

loans.name: Kandil

texts.ru: Кандил на протяжении 10 лет занимается откормом крупного и мелкого  рогатого скота. Он женат имеет пятерых детей. Семья большая. Содержать такую семью очень тяжело. Он на полученную прибыль старается создать хорошие условия для воспитания и обучения своих детей. Жена занимается по домашнему хозяйству и присматривает за детьми. Для откорма и выращивания скота требуется много усилий. Он хочет увеличить поголовье скота. Для этого запрашивает займ в размере 3 000 сомони для приобретения несколько голов крупного и мелкого рогатого скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарен вам.
texts.en: For the past 10 years, Kandil has been in the business of fattening cattle and small livestock. He is married and has five children. His family is large and supporting a family of this size is difficult. He uses his profits to try to create good living conditions to raise and educate his children. His wife is a homemaker and looks after the children. Fattening and breeding cattle takes a lot of work. He wants to increase his herd. To this end, he is requesting a loan of 3,000 somoni to purchase a few cattle and small livestock. He looks forward to your help and thanks you in advance.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Ilham

texts.en:
Ilham is a 58-year-old Lebanese married woman living with her husband. She has owned a clothing shop since 2008, and now she’s trying her best to earn more income and be able to live as it should be, especially after being the one responsible for the family with her unemployed husband. 

Today, she’s requesting to borrow $1300 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a new collection of clothes with new designs, accessories and others. She notes that this Kiva loan will increase her sales and help her attract new customers. In the future, she plans to open other branches in different areas.

loans.use: to purchase a new collection of clothes with new designs, accessories and others.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is 35 years old and married with one child. He sells fruits such as oranges, bananas and pawpaws to earn a living. He has been in the business for 12 years and has employed three people. He also earns extra income from his hardware shop. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya Stephen has been able to improve his living standards. He hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy oranges, bananas and pawpaws.

loans.use: To  buy  oranges, bananas and pawpaws.

loans.name: Hani

texts.en: Hani is a 61-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and only one working child. He’s trying the best he can to cover his family expenses. He has been working as a taxi driver since 1985, independently, upon customers’ requests. Today, he needs to borrow $2100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to perform the needed maintenance on his car. In that way, he will be capable to carry on his job in a proper way. In the future, he plans to buy a minivan in order to transport more people.

loans.use: to perform the needed maintenance on his car.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a 39-year-old man. He’s single, living with his parents and only one working sibling. He’s a hard worker, ready to support his family as much as he can and show help whenever they need it. He has been working selling air conditioners for the past three years and has his own shop. 

Today, he’s asking to borrow $2600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase new air conditioners and some related items. This will definitely boost his profits thus increase his revenues. In the future, he plans to open other branches in the neighbor towns.

loans.use: to purchase new air conditioners and some related items.

loans.name: Marwan

texts.en:
Marwan is a 43-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and two children, one of whom is working. He’s trying the best he can to fulfill his family's needs in order to enrich their way of living. 

Marwan has been working as a painter on a free-lance basis for the past twenty-five years and has gained different clients from different areas. Today, he wants to borrow $2600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a car for his business. He’s sure that this will help him respond rapidly to his customer’s requests. In the future, he plans to enlarge his business and take on bigger projects.

loans.use: to purchase a car for his business.

loans.name: Bahovaddin

texts.ru: Баховаддин занимается услугами такси уже 20 лет. Он целеустремленный и добросовестный человек. Он предоставляет услуги такси в своем городе. Он имеет два автомобиля, один «Опель» а другой «ГАЗ-24». Его машины обе старые и часто требует ремонта. Он хочет продать автомобиль «Опель» и купить новою автомашину. Его денег не хватает на новую автомашину и он хотел бы получить займ и добавить для покупки автомобиля. Это покупка ему нужна, которая поможет  ему предоставлять  клиентам более удобную и комфортную перевозку с одного пункта в другой. Он надеется на вашу поддержку и благодарит вас
texts.en: Bahovaddin has been involved in providing a taxi service for 20 years.  He is a goal-oriented and conscientious person.  He provides a taxi service in his city.  Bahovaddin has two cars, one of which is an "Opel" and the other is "GAZ-24."  Both of his cars are old and often require repairs.  He wants to sell the "Opel" and purchase a new car.  Bahovaddin does not have enough money for a new car and wants to obtain this loan, and add these funds to purchase the car.  This purchase is necessary because it will help him to provide a more convenient and comfortable transportation service for his clients from one place to another.  He hopes to get your support and thanks you.

loans.use: to purchase a new car

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en:
Hassan is a 43-year-old married man, father of four children.

Hassan has worked in construction for 26 years, specializing in cement work. This long experience gives him a special place among competitors providing the same service. Hassan needs to buy necessary tools and machines for his business to keep his business updated, that's why he applied for his first time for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua. Hassan is sure that the loan will bring him good luck and success, because it's invested in improving his business, which will definitely improve his family's social and financial situations.

Hassan hopes to continue expanding his business for a better future for his family and business as a whole.

loans.use: to buy necessary tools and machines for his business

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 33-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and four children, who are all studying. He cooperates with his wife to pay their children’s educational fees. She sells clothes from her home. As for Mohammad, he decided to open his own vehicle repair shop in 2001, after 15 years of experience in this domain. In parallel, he transports students with his own school bus. Today, he’s in need of a loan of 1,300 USD from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase added mechanical equipment for his shop. This Kiva loan will certainly develop his business and help him attract new customers. In the future, he plans to take more Kiva loans and improve his garage.

loans.use: to purchase added mechanical equipment for his shop

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 35 years old and married with four children. He sells used clothes to earn a living. He also runs a retail shop to earn extra income. He has been in business for ten years and has employed one person.

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, James has been able to expand his business. He has applied for 45,000 KES to buy additional used clothes to sell.

James’ wish is to be financially stable in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Kassem

texts.en:
Kassem is a 34-year-old Lebanese married man living with his three school-aged children. He’s the family's main source of support and they all depend on him, especially for paying their educational fees in addition to all other family expenses.

Kassem has been working in construction, specializing in completing wall foliage work, for the past nine years. He has been waiting for the perfect timing to grow in this field as much as possible. In parallel, he works as a constructor in a local company. Kassem is now looking to borrow $1,200 from Kiva's partner, Ameen s.a.l, to purchase new construction supplies such as foliage paper, scaffolding and many other items. In the future, he plans to take on bigger projects outside the country.

loans.use: to purchase new construction supplies

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 24-year-old Lebanese single man. He lives with his parents and two working siblings. Even though they all cooperate, Mohamad's father is still considered the main income provider in the family. For that reason, Mohamad decided to have his own job in order to help his father with the family expenses.

Mohamad started his work as a barber in 2007 and has gained a fair number of loyal customers. He is now asking for a loan of $1,200 from Kiva's partner, Ameen s.a.l, to renovate his salon. This Kiva loan will help him attract new clients and develop his business. In the future, Mohamad plans to improve his work and learn new haircut designs.

loans.use: to renovate his salon

loans.name: Nurali

texts.ru:
Нурали трудолюбивый мужчина. Он женат и имеет пятерых детей. Дети очень любят и уважают его. Его жена домохозяйка. Она занимается воспитанием детей. Ведь содержать такую большую семью нелегко. На протяжении 4 лет он занимается продажей дисков. Клиентов у него много так как есть большой спрос на данный товар. Также в своем магазине он поставил копировальный аппарат, на котором ксерокопирует разные документы. От чего тоже имеет немалый доход. Он хотел бы получить займ в размере 4000 сомони для расширения своего бизнеса, приобретения большого количества дисков.
Он надеется на вашу помощь и благодарен вам.
texts.en: Nurali is a hardworking man. He is married and has five children. His children love and respect him. Nurali's wife is a home maker, she raises their children. It is hard for Nurali to be able to support such a large family alone. For the last four years he has been offering CDs and DVDs for sale. Nurali's store has many regular clients because his goods are very popular. He also installed a copier and is offering various copy services, which yield a good profit as well. Nurali wants to take out a loan of 4000 somoni to expand his business and purchase a large batch of DVDs. He is hoping for your help and grateful for it.

loans.use: To buy CDs and DVDs in order to expand business

loans.name: Muzafar

texts.ru: Музафар примерный семьянин. Отец шестерых детей. Жена домохозяйка. В бизнесе помогает единственный сын. Для содержания своей семьи он занимается торговлей женских тканей. Спрос на женские ткани очень большой, так как женщины всегда хотят красиво одеваться. Продает также мужских одежд. Он хотел бы получить займ в размере 1000 долларов США для расширения ассортимента товаров. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Muzafar is an exemplary family man. He is a father of six children and his wife is a home maker. To support his family Muzafar owns a fabric store for ladies. His only son helps him with this business. There is always demand for fabrics because women always want to dress well. Aside from his fabric business Muzafar also sells men's clothing. He wants to take out a loan of 1000 US dollars to expand his store's inventory. Muzafar hopes for your help and charity.

loans.use: To buy merchandise in order to expand his business

loans.name: Abdalym

texts.ru:
Абдалым 47-летний фермер, живущий в с .Ак-Булак, что на юге Кыргызстана. Имеет пятерых детей, жена домохозяйка.  С 1991 года семья Абдалыма успешно занимается разведением скота и полеводством. На сегодняшний	 день, в  хозяйстве Абдалыма есть коровы, телята, для хорошего прокорма которых  Абдалым заготовил корма в виде кукурузы, сена и жмыха.  Также, семья Абдалыма, обрабатывая о,25 Га земли, получила 2,5 тонны картошки, реализацией которой они будут заниматься зимой.   Доходы от такой бизнес - деятельности  позволили Абдалыму приобрести машину для своей семьи.  
 Для дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Абдалым обратился в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) для закупа дополнительного поголовья скота для откорма. В ближайшее время, Абдалым  планирует женить своего сына.
texts.en:
Abdalym is a 47-year-old farmer. He lives in Ak-Bulak, a village in the south of Kyrgyzstan. He has five kids, and his wife is a homemaker. Since 1991, Abdalym’s family has been successfully engaged in growing crops and livestock breeding. Today, the Abdalym’s farm has cows and calves, and enough corn, hay and oil cake for their feed. After cultivating 0.25 hectares of land, Abdalym’s family collected 2.5 tons of potatoes, which they will use during the winter. The income from such business allowed Abdalym to buy a car for his family. 

Abdalym applied for a loan of 100.000 som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum & Partners to purchase more cattle. In the very near future, Abdalym is planning to arrange for his son’s marriage.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 33-year-old married man living with his wife. Like everyone in his age, Ali hopes to have his own family and children. Because of that, he’s working really hard to reach his goals. 

Ali started his own business as a taxi driver in 2005. He’s honest and well known for being always on time. He has his own taxi and works independently upon customers’ requests. Today, he wants to borrow $1000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to perform the needed maintenance on his car and pay its mechanic fees. He will benefit from this loan by improving his work and therefore getting higher income. In the future, he plans to buy a van and serve a wider range of people.

loans.use: To perform the needed maintenance on his car and pay its mechanic fees.

loans.name: Kassem

texts.en:
Kassem is a 22-year-old single Lebanese man living with his parents and three siblings, of whom one is working. He’s doing the best he can to offer a respectable life to his family and help his father, who is their main source of income. 

Kassem began taking his own Gipson (a ceiling products manufacturer) projects on a freelance basis in 2007. He’s specialized in installing Gipson products and creating new decoration designs. Today, he’s in need of a loan of $1200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase added Gipson boards in order to further develop his business and increase his profits. In the future, he seeks to open his own Gipson board factory.

loans.use: To purchase added Gipson boards.

loans.name: Ganzorig

texts.en:
Mr. Ganzorig is 26 years old and lives with his wife and his daughter in Kherlen, a boundary town in Mongolia. He works as a watchman in a private company. He also runs a taxi business around the town. It is beneficial to increase his family income.

Lately his taxi car has been becoming old and bad to use for taxi service. Therefore he decided to make a repair to his car. It needs new spare parts for the renovation. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to purchasing the spare parts for his car repair.

loans.use: to purchase the spare parts for his car repair

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es:
La señora María, de 43 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de cosméticos en la ciudad de León, es casada, madre de tres hijos. Además de vender cosméticos se dedica a dar clases de matemática en una escuela secundaria. Ella tiene 8 años de dedicarse a la venta de cosméticos el cual inicio con capital propio y el apoyo de su esposo la mayoría de sus clientes son de la escuela secundaria donde ella imparte clases, aunque también tiene clientes en bancos y fabricas cercanas en su vecindario. 
Ella requiere el préstamo para comprar cosméticos, ya que tiene pedidos de sus clientes y necesita vender para hacer crecer su negocio y mejorar sus ingresos. Una de sus expectativas es poner una mini tienda en su casa. Ella desea darles un futuro mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María, 43, sells cosmetics in the city of León.  She’s married and the mother of three children.  Besides selling cosmetics she also teaches math at a secondary school.  She’s been selling cosmetics for 8 years, a business she started with her own capital and with help from her husband.  Most of her customers are at the secondary school where she teaches although she also has customers in banks and factories near her neighborhood.

She needs the loan to buy cosmetics because she has customer orders and needs to sell in order for her business to grow and to improve her income.  One of her expectations is to open a minimarket at home.  She wants to give her children a better future.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more clothes

loans.name: Zoxrab

texts.ru: Zoxrab jenat i imeyet 4 detey. Yego deti chasto pomogayut otcu po rabote. On yavlyayetsya IDP personom pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey semyoy. Zoxrab 49 let. On uje 10 let kak rabotayet masnikom. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit maso dlya pereprodaji. Zoxrab ochen trudolubiviy chelovek.
texts.en: Zoxrab is married and has 4 children. His children often help him in his work.  He is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person), a refugee from the city of Fuzuli and is currently living in the Fuzuli region with his family. Zoxrab is 49 years old.  He has been working as a butcher for the last 10 years. Currently he needs 2,000 AZN to buy meat for resale. Zoxrab is a very hard-working  person.

loans.use: to buy meat for resale.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius has watched his business grow since he serviced his previous loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings. He used the loan to add to his stock of meat and he was able to make good sales. He has also grown his clientele because of good customer care skills.

Julius desires to expand his business over the next five years. He has requested 60,000 Kenya shillings to buy more meat.

loans.use: to add to his stock of meat.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter used his previous loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings to buy new tyres and a car battery to service his vehicle. He serviced his van and his business improved. Currently, he has a challenge because his van is in bad condition. Hence he has requested for another loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to service his van.

Peter hopes to own a bus for a transport business in five years for more income generation.

loans.use: to service his van.

loans.name: Shaig

texts.ru:
Shaig rodilsya v 1986 qodu. On zamujem no ne imeyet detey. Shaig jivet v Baku regione vmeste so svoyey jenoy.
On uje 4 qoda kak imeyet svayo taxi. Shaig nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit zapchasti dlya togo chtobi pochinit svoyu mashinu tak kak ona isporchena i on ne mojet rabotat i poluchat svoyu pribil. Shaig etomu bisnessu nauchilsta u svoyego otca kotoriy toje rabotayet taxistom.
texts.en: Shaig was born in 1986. He is married, but has no children. Shaih lives together with his wife in the Baku district. He has operated his own taxi for four years. Shaig needs 2000 AZN to buy spare parts to repair his car, which is in poor condition. As a result, he can’t work and earn any money. Shaig learned this business from his father, who also worked as a taxi driver.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his car

loans.name: Khachik

texts.en:
Khachik is engaged in agriculture. He keeps cattle and cultivates land. Khachik needs some financial investments to cultivate the land successfully. 

With the requested loan Khachik plans to purchase agricultural equipment, which will help him to collect the grass. New equipment will allow Khachik to make the working process more effective and develop agriculture further. This will help him to get additional income and meet the family's needs. 

Khachik lives together with his wife, three daughters, and son.

loans.use: to pay for agricultural eqiupment

loans.name: Hovhannes

texts.en: Hovhannes is engaged in agriculture. He keeps cattle.  Hovhannes has been engaged in agriculture for many years and has also managed to open a little shop of fruits and vegetables.  Now Hovhannes would like to develop his farm. With the loan's help he will increase the number of livestock he has.  The increase of livestock will allow Hovhannes to get more income and start cultivating land in the future and sell the produce in his shop.

loans.use: pay for livestock and forage

loans.name: Bat-Ulzii

texts.en:
Mr. Bat-Ulzii, 34,  runs a taxi around the districts of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been conducting his business since 2009. Before that, he used to work as a bus driver for over 3 years and has gained enough experience by himself. He is divorced and his children live with his wife, separately. 

Recently he has exchanged his old Russian car for a new Toyota Carina for better serving and improving the business. But he could not yet pay its cost off to the seller. Changing cars will influence the passengers' satisfaction and increase the number of clients. 

The loan he is taking will be used to cover the cost of his new car for his taxi business.

loans.use: To cover the cost of his new car for his taxi business.

loans.name: Yadamsuren

texts.en:
Yadamsuren is 28 years old. He lives with his two children and wife in a ger, the traditional Mongolian nomadic tent, in the ger district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He runs a taxi business, which he started in 2009, but his income is insufficient to meet his family expenses. His car is not so bad, but it is getting old and has some damaged parts.

Yadamsuren needs to provide routine maintenance to his car in order to provide his clients with safe and comfortable service. This is very important to both maintaining his normal operations and ensuring his future business. He will use the requested loan to cover the cost of routine auto maintenance for his car.

loans.use: to pay for routine maintenance to his taxi.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es: Gregorio, trabajador, comerciante. Con el ultimo préstamo logro invertir en mercadería mejorando las condiciones de venta y adquiriendo mayor clientela, permitiéndole crear un mejor proyecto para su negocio.  Ampliarlo la infraestructura y así abastecerlo de mayores cantidades y variedades en productos. Esta solicitando el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de mercadería aumentando su inventario actual para cumplir con sus ventas para este mes que es de fiesta y se requieren tener productos como: aceitunas, petipua, vegetales, pollo, carnes de res y cerdo, lácteos, arroz, frijoles, aceite, azúcar, jabones de baños, trasto y de lavar ropa, enlatados como maíz, vinagres, gaseosas, papel higiénico, entre otros productos. Ofreciéndole a sus clientes variedad de productos. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo constante al desarrollo de su negocio y alcanzar un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Gregorio, a hardworking merchant, used his previous loan to buy merchandise thus improving his sales and acquiring more customers which allowed him to create a better project for his business expanding its infrastructure and stocking it with more and more varied products.

He is asking for this loan to buy merchandise to increase his current inventory to meet sales projected for this festive month.  He needs such products as: olives, petite pois, vegetables, chicken, beef and pork, dairy products, rice, beans, oil, sugar, bath soap, dish soap and laundry detergent, canned goods like corn, vinegar, soft-drinks, toilet paper, among others, thus offering his customers wider variety of products.  

He thanks the financial institution for the constant support to his business’ development and for his reaching a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Haroun

texts.en:
Haroun is a 28-year-old married Lebanese man who lives with his wife. Even with the heavy life expenses and the non-stop demands, Haroun is still working under pressure to live in a proper way. In order to return more income to his family, he decided to open his own sweet factory in 2004 after having twelve years of experience in this domain. He has built a good reputation in addition to the pleasant and delicious taste of his products.

Today, Haroun is asking for a loan of $1000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase new supplies for his factory, such as an oven, refrigerator, and many other items. In the future, he plans to open his own pastry shop.

loans.use: To purchase new supplies for his factory, such as an oven, refrigerator, and many other items.

loans.name: Adolfo Hernando

texts.es:
Adolfo is 46 years old and is an enterprising man. In an empirical way and without any experience he sought to improve his quality of life. With much effort and discipline he built a small apartment in his family home so that he could become independent and in that space started his own barbershop. In his barbershop he also sells merchandise such as lotions and clothing. 

Adolfo needs to purchase merchandise to supply his business and meet the orders that he has gotten from customers. Adolfo's dream is to see his business grow as well as his income and thus improve the quality of life for his mother and siblings.
texts.en: El señor Adolfo a sus 46 años de edad es un emprendedor quien de manera empírica y sin experiencia alguna buscando mejorar su calidad de vida, elige construir con mucho esfuerzo y disciplina un pequeño apartamento en su casa familiar, con el fin de independizarse y así en éste lugar inicar su propia barberia con venta de mercancía tal como lociones y prendas de vestir. El señor Adolfo requiere de la compra de mercancia para surtir su negocio y cumplir con los pedidos que sus clientes le han solicitado. El sueño del señor Adolfo es ver crecer su negocio y de esta manera sus ingresos y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su madre y hermanos.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as lotions and clothing.

loans.name: Luis Alfonso

texts.es: Luis, de oficio comerciante, 38 años de edad, padre de familia,  tiene dos hijos de 20 y 10 años de edad ambos están estudiando, su esposa trabaja con el apoyándolo en el mercado. Inicialmente el se dedica a ser sastre, el elabora pantalones, camisas, uniformes pero los ingresos no era muy buenos, decidió buscar otra forma que le ayudara a generar mejores ganancias. Al cumplir 33 años de edad invirtió en compra de ropa nueva para vender desde entonces ha visto que este negocio ha resultado rentable tanto así que trabaja junto con su esposa en el mercado para atender este negocio. Hoy en día combina su actividad como comerciante y sastre pues en base a esto es que su familia sobrevive. El requiere el préstamo para compra de tela  para elaborar uniformes e invertir en ropa nueva para vender esta temporada navideña. Uno de sus proyectoS es dedicarse a elaborar uniformes exclusivamente para colegios y hacer crecer su venta de ropa nueva.
texts.en:
Luis, 38, is a merchant and father.  He has two children, ages 20 and 10, both of whom are studying.  His wife works helping him in the market.

Originally he worked as a tailor.  He makes pants, shirts, and uniforms, but the income was not very good.  He decided to look for another form of work that would help him generate greater profits.  When he turned 33 he invested in buying new clothing to sell.  Since then he has seen that this business has turned out to be profitable, so much so that he works with his wife in the market to tend to this business.

Now he combines his work as a merchant and tailor, since this is how his family survives.  He needs the loan to buy fabric to make uniforms and to invest in new clothes to sell this Christmas season.  One of his projects is making uniforms exclusively for schools and making his new-clothing sales grow.

loans.use: to buy new clothing for Christmas sales and fabric to make uniforms.

loans.name: Manuel Natividad

texts.es:
Manuel, de nuevo se decidió a obtener un préstamo para seguir mejorando su negocio, en esta ocasion la inversion es en productos básicos como: maíz, frijoles y otros productos al por mayor, esta nueva inversion se dio debido a la demanda de los clientes y sobre todo para aumentar en sus ganancias, ya que estos productos los puede distribuir con mayor facilidad, al mismo tiempo que vende los materiales de construccion, esta distribucion a los negocios la realiza en los camiones de carga, como los furgones, ya que recorre todo el pais, teniendo ya los puntos donde le esperan los clientes.

El préstamo anterior le ayudo mucho puesto que mejoro el servicio a los clientes, ya que con el dinero compro insumos para el transporte, su objetivo es seguir ofreciendo productos de calidad y su familia pudo ser beneficiada de este avance en el comercio.
texts.en:
Manuel again decided to get a new loan to continue improving his business in basic goods like: corn, beans, and other wholesale products. He needs this new investment due to his customers' demand, and above all, to increase his profits since he can now distribute his products more easily. He also sells construction materials, distributing them by truck and van to various businesses around the country where his clients are waiting.

The previous loan helped him a lot as he improved his service to his customers, and allowed him to buy equipment to transport. His goal is to continue offering quality products. His family was benefited by this advancement in the business.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans and other wholesale products.

loans.name: Artak

texts.en:
Artak is a young entrepreneur from Yerevan. He trades construction materials and household goods.  To meet the clients' demands, Artak needs to enlarge the variety of goods he sells.  With the loan's help, Artak will increase his working capital and support his household. 

Artak lives with his wife, parents, brother and two little children.

loans.use: to pay for construction materials and household goods.

loans.name: Rafik

texts.en: Rafik lives together with his wife, parents and two little daughters. The family gets its main income from agriculture: cattle breeding and land cultivation. Rafik has applied for a loan to develop sheep-breeding. With the requested loan he plans to purchase sheep and forage. Development of sheep-breeding will allow Rafik to sell more meat and fleece and increase his business income. With more income Rafik will sustain his family with better conditions.

loans.use: to pay for sheep and forage

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert sells clothing from a rented booth in the city market. Robert needs some financial investments to increase his clothing variety. This will allow Robert to meet the clients' demand during the winter season. This loan will allow Robert to increase his sales and get more income. Additional income will help Robert to pay for his children's education and insure stable future for them. Robert lives together with his wife, parents, and two school-age children.

loans.use: to pay for clothing

loans.name: Harutyun

texts.en: Harutyun lives with his wife and two children. He has been engaged in agriculture for five years. Now Harutyun needs some investments to develop agriculture. Harutyun would like to increase the number of cattle. This will allow Harutyun to make and sell more cheese and get additional income. With more income Harutyun plans to purchase some new furniture and household goods for his family to insure improved living conditions for them.

loans.use: to pay for cattle

loans.name: Davit

texts.en: Davit is engaged in agriculture. Davit would like to increase the number of cattle and develop his farm. This will help Davit to cover his family's daily costs and also save for his children's education in the future. Davit lives together with his wife and two children.

loans.use: to pay for cattle and develop his farm

loans.name: Hamlet

texts.en: Hamlet is a driver. To sustain his family Hamlet is also engaged in agriculture. Hamlet would like to develop cattle breeding, for which he needs sufficient financial means. With the requested loan, Hamlet plans to purchase cattle, as well as to pay for the barn's renovation. More cattle will allow Hamlet to make more cheese and sell it. Hamlet will increase his profit and insure improved living conditions for his family. Hamlet lives together with his wife and two children.

loans.use: to pay for cattle barn renovation

loans.name: Gegham

texts.en: Gegham lives with his wife, mother and children. Gegham is engaged in agricultural business. He keeps cattle and cultivates land. To insure better conditions for the cattle and develop it Gegham plans to purchase hay and renovate the barn. This will allow Gegham to keep the current number of livestock and increase it in the future.

loans.use: to pay for hay and barn renovation

loans.name: Vahagn

texts.en: Vahagn lives together with his wife and son. His family's main income comes from cattle breeding and beekeeping. To cover the rising demand for agricultural products (and especially honey) in the community and nearby communities, Vahagn plans to expand his farm. With the loan's help Vahagn will purchase livestock, hay and beehives. Vahagn will get additional income and insure sustainable future or his family.

loans.use: to pay for livestock, hay, and beehives

location.town: Getap village of Vayots Dzor region

loans.name: Gevorg

texts.en: Gevorg is a farmer from Vostan Village, Armenia. Because of unfavorable weather conditions Gevorg doesn't get enough harvest to use for his household economy and to sell. Thus Gevorg would like to grow plants, fruits and vegetables in a glasshouse, too. With the loan's help Gevorg will pay for the construction of glasshouse and purchase seeds to plant there. Gevorg will increase the income from agriculture and sustain his family with prosperous living conditions. Gevorg lives together with his wife and two children.

loans.use: to pay for seeds and glasshouse construction

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 34 years old, married, and has two children.  He sells kerosene to earn a living. He has been in this business for four years. He also does farming to supplement his income.  

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, John has grown his business.  He hopes to expand his business in the future.
  
He needs a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to buy kerosene.

loans.use: to buy kerosene.

loans.name: Ashot

texts.ru:
Ашоту 52 года. Он проживает в деревне Антарашат, Сьюникского региона. Ашот женат и у него четверо сыновей: старшему 21 год, а младшему – 6 лет. Ашот работает оператором смены на телевизионной вышке и параллельно занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью.  
Сельским хозяйством Ашот занимается почти 18 лет. Жена помогает ему в этом и совместными усилиями они разводят крупный рогатый скот, овец и кур. Так же они выращивают овощи и фрукты на продажу. 
Мясо, молоко, яйца и другую сельскохозяйственную продукцию Ашот реализует в городах Капане и Каджаране, посредством сдачи продуктов в магазины и небольшие лавочки.  
Благодаря занятию сельским хозяйством, Ашот содержит семью и платит за обучение сыновей. 
Ашоту необходим кредит в размере 700.000 драм для приобретения шести бычков для своей фермы.  
Данный кредит является четвертым по счету, получаемым Ашотом от организации Нор Оризон и он никогда не задерживал выплат по кредиту.
texts.en:
Ashot is 52 years old. He lives in the village Antarashat of the Syunikskiy region. Ashot is married and has four sons: the oldest son is 21 and the youngest is 6 years old. Ashot works as a shift operator at a television tower and is simultaneously engaged in agricultural activities.

Ashot has been in this business for almost eighteen years. His wife helps him in this and together they raise large horned cattle, sheep and chickens. They also grow vegetables and fruits for sale.

Ashot sells meat, milk, eggs and other agricultural products in the towns of Kapan and Kadjaran by taking products to stores and small shops. Thanks to the farming business Ashot supports his family and pays for his sons' education.

Ashot needs a loan in the amount of 700,000 drams for the purchase of six bulls for his farm. This loan is the fourth one which Ashot received from the organization Nor Horizon and he never held up payments on a loan.

loans.use: To buy 6 calves for his farm

loans.name: Davit

texts.en: Davit is engaged in agriculture. Unable to find sufficient financial means to cultivate the land, Davit has applied for a loan. With the requested loan he plans to purchase seeds. This loan will allow Davit to get a good harvest and increase his income by selling it. With additional income Davit will sustain his family with improved living conditions and cover the costs of his big family. Davit lives together with his wife, children, parents, brother, and sister.

loans.use: to pay for seed

loans.name: John Fredy

texts.es: El señor John Fredy a sus 25 años de edad es propietario de un negocio de fabricación y venta de arepas desde hace cuatro años, esto es gracias a la madre del señor John Fredy quien lo ha apoyado siempre. En su fabrica, el señor John Fredy produce 1200 paquetes diarios y actualmente requiere de la compra de un vehiculo en el cual pueda transportar su producto terminado y así cumplir a tiempo con todos sus pedidos y ofrecer un mejor servicio. Con lo anterior, el señor John Fredy podrá mejorar sus ingresos y la calidad de vida de él y su madre. A futuro, el señor John Fredy sueña con tener su fabrica de arepas bien posicionada en el mercado.
texts.en:
Señor John Fredy is 25 years old. For the past four years, he has owned a business, which makes and sells arepas [flat, round, unleavened patties made of cornmeal or flour which can be grilled, baked, boiled, or fried]. He has been able to do so thanks to his mother who has always supported him. 

In his arepa factory, John Fredy produces 1,200 arepas daily. At present, he needs to purchase a vehicle in which to transport the finished product so that he can fulfill all of his orders on time and offer better service. Having a vehicle, John Fredy will be able to improve both his income and the quality of life for his mother and himself.  In the future, John Fredy dreams that his arepa factory will be well positioned in the market.

loans.use: to purchase a vehicle to transport his finished arepas.

loans.name: Gegham

texts.en: Gegham is engaged in cattle-breeding. Gegham dreams of founding a big farm, where he can keep different kinds of cattle. Thus Gegham has applied for a loan to increase the number of cattle. This loan will help Gegham make his farm larger and more stable, which will allow him to sustain his family. Gegham lives together with his son and daughter.

loans.use: to pay for cattle

loans.name: Augusto Cesar

texts.es: Augusto de 25 años de edad, originario de Estelí, soltero, de oficio comerciante se dedica a la venta de equipos odontológicos, su primera experiencia vivida atravez del préstamo Kiva fue muy positiva para el pues logro buenas ventas pues vendía repuestos y equipos odontológicos. Hoy en día ofrece sus productos en las ciudades de León, Chinandega y Managua poco a poca ha estado haciendo nuevos clientes. Por tal motivo esta solicitando otro crédito para comprar manguera, jeringas, filtros, guantes, material para elaborar dentaduras. Pues desea ofrecer estos productos en diferentes ciudades para darse a conocer y lograr uno de sus objetivos propuestos que lograr tener un local donde pueda ofrecer variedad de equipos y repuestos odontológicos.
texts.en: Augusto, who is 25 years old, is a native of Estelí, single and works as a salesman.  He makes his living selling dental equipment.  His first experience with a Kiva loan was very positive.  His sales of spare dental parts and dental equipment were good.  Nowadays he offers his products in the cities of León, Chinandega and Managua.  Little by little, he has been earning new customers.  Which is why he is requesting another loan- to purchase hose, syringes, filters, gloves and materials for making dentures.  He wants to offer these products for sale in different cities, to make himself known and to achieve one his goals: to have a store in which he can offer a variety of dental equipment and spare parts for sale.

loans.use: to purchase used dentistry equipment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy a laptop computer

loans.name: Juan Manuel

texts.es:
Juan Manuel vive en Camaná, Perú, un oasis en el otro modo de largo y seco desierto de Sechura que domina la costa en la parte sudoeste del país. Camaná ha sido históricamente un importante destino turístico en el Perú, sin embargo, los frecuentes y fuertes terremotos y tsunamis en la última década (un 8,4 en 2001 y 8,0 en 2007) diezmó la ciudad, destruido la industria del turismo en Camaná, y costando muchos de sus puestos de trabajo, los medios de subsistencia, y los hogares. En sus tiempos libres disfruta de jugar el futbol porque le apasiona mucho, asi como también nos comenta que uno de sus platos favoritos es el “Saltado de Carne” es mas nos comenta que el comeria ese plato todos los días. Juan solo estudio hasta el quinto año de secundaria debido a los pocos medios económicos de sus padres, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar educación.

Juan actualmente trabaja en su negocio de venta de artefactos electrodomésticos como radios, televisores, así como también USB, le dedica a su trabajo 12 horas diarias, puede ganar hasta s/. 80 en un dia pero en un dia muy bueno puede ganar hasta S/. 120, el cree que le va bien en su negocio debido a la buen trato que ofrece a sus clientes y porque ofrece productos de calidad.

Juan esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá comprar mas mercadería(artefactos) y con ello tendra una mejora en su negocio ya que tendra mas variedad de productos y tendra mas ingresos para seguir ahorrando y cumplir su mas grande sueño: “Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Juan Manuel lives in Camaná, Peru, an oasis in the otherwise long and dry Sechura desert that dominates the coast, in the southwest part of the country. Camaná has historically been an important tourist destination in Peru, however the frequent, strong earthquakes and tsunamis of the recent decade (an 8.4 in 2001 and an 8.0 in 2007) decimated the city, destroyed the tourist industry in Camaná and cost the city many jobs, means of subsistence and homes.

In his free time, Juan enjoys playing soccer because he is an enthusiast. In addition, one of his favorite dishes is “saltado de carne” (stir-fry beef spaghetti). He tells us he would eat it every day if he could. He only studied until the fifth year of secondary school because his parents had few resources, although he would have greatly liked to become a teacher. 

Currently Juan works in his business selling appliances such as radios, televisions, as well as flash drives. He works 12 hours a day and usually earns up to 80 nuevos soles a day, however on a very good day he can earn up to 120 nuevos soles. He believes that his business is doing well because of good customer relations and because of the high quality of the products he offers.

Juan is very grateful to KIVA lenders for, thanks to your support, he will be able to buy more merchandise (appliances) and will see his business improve because he will have a greater variety of products and earn more profit. Consequently he will be able to continue saving so he can fulfill his greatest dream: “Owning his own home.”

loans.use: to buy more merchandise.

loans.name: Francisco Evelio

texts.es: El señor Evelio a sus 33 años de edad es padre de un hijo de 9 años, es propietario de una legumbreria que creó luego de tener la necesidad de desplazarse para la ciudad luego de vivir en un pueblo del sur de Antioquia. El señor Evelio requiere de la compra de surtido de frutas y verduras que le permita tener productos suficientes para suplir la demanda de fin de año. Con lo anterior, podrán incrementar los ingresos del señor Evelio y de esta forma mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y cumplir su sueño de ver crecer su negocio.
texts.en: Señor Evelio, at the age of 33, is the father of a 9-year-old son and proprietor of a produce shop which he set up after needing to move to the city from a town in the south of Antioquia. Sr. Evelio needs to buy a stock of fruits and vegetables so that he will have sufficient products to fill the demand at the end of the year. This additional stock will increase the income of Sr. Evelio and in this way improve the quality of life of his family and fulfill his dream of seeing his business grow.

loans.use: to buy a stock of fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Rahimdjon

texts.ru: Рахимджон добрый и честный человек. Более 20 лет он занимается скотоводством. Этот бизнес приносит ему стабильный доход,  и он содержит свою семью за счет данного бизнеса. Члены его семьи помогают ему по ухаживанию за скотом и его откорму. В данное время он имеет 2 голов быка дома. После откорма он продает их местным мясникам. Рахимджон хочет увеличить поголовье быков с целью расширения бизнеса. С этой целью он запрашивает займ в размере 9000 Сомони. Он надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарит вас всех.
texts.en: Rahimdjon is a decent and honest person. He has worked in the cattle sales business for more than 20 years. This business provides him with a steady income with which he supports his family. His family helps by caring for the cattle and fattening them. Currently he has 2 heads of bulls at home. After fattening them, he sells them to local butchers. Rahimdjon wants to increase the number of bulls to expand his business. To this end, he is requesting a loan for 9,000 somoni. He looks forward to your assistance and thanks you all in advance.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase new bedroom furniture.

loans.name: Farukh

texts.ru: Фарух занимается услугой такси более 15 лет. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Он имеет собственный автомобиль марки «Мерседес». Он таксист дальних рейсов. Он перевозит клиентов с одного города в другой. Его автомобиль часто требует ремонта и он хочет купить новую автомашину марки «Джип», чтобы удобно и комфортно было пассажирам и уменьшились расходы  ремонта. Он уже частично оплатил за автомобиль, а остальную задолженность хочет погасить, c этой целю, запрашивает займ в размере 10000 Сомони. Он надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарен вам.
texts.en: Farukh has been in the taxi service for over fifteen years. He is married and has three children. He is a very hardworking and conscientious man. Farukh has his own car, a Mercedes. He is a long distance taxi driver. He transports clients from one city to another. His car is often in need of repair and he wants to buy a new car, a Jeep, in order to be convenient and comfortable for passengers and reduce the cost of repair. Farukh has already partially paid for the car and with the purpose to repay the remaining debt he is asking for a loan of 10,000 somoni. He looks forward to your help and thanks everyone in advance.

loans.use: to buy a new car.

loans.name: Ilyosjon

texts.ru: Илесчон житель Гиссарского района. Ему 24 года. Он женат. Имеет среднее образование. Илесчон предоставляет услугу, такси. В этой области он три года. Он берет кредит для приобретения новой машины.
texts.en: Ilyosjon is a resident of the Gissar District. He is 24 years old. He is married and has a high school education. Ilyosjon is offering taxi services.  He has been in this business for 3 years.  He is taking out a loan to purchase a new car.

loans.use: to purchase a new car.

loans.name: Elder Jose

texts.es:
Elder Jose  tiene 22 años de edad, ella vive en Ica ,Ica, Perú. Ica se encuentra ubicado en el Desierto de Sechura cerca de cuatro horas al sur de Lima, la capital del país, y es aclamado por los peruanos como "La Tierra del Sol". Es conocida en el Perú por sus frecuentes terremotos (un 8,0 en 2007 y 6.9 en 2011), su producción de uvas, espárragos y aceitunas, y tal vez sobre todo, como la fuente de la bebida tradicional del Perú nacional, el Pisco. En este clima cálido y árido se encuentra la casa y empresa del cliente.  En su tiempo libre disfruta Leer;  como bien se sabe el Perú se caracteriza por tener las comidas más deliciosas del mundo y uno de los platos que a Elder Jose  es Ceviche. Elder Jose estudió hasta quinto año de secundaria Medicina. 
	  
"Elder se dedica a su negocio de venta de abarrotes , se dedica a este trabajo 8 horas diarias,. En un día Elder puede atender  30 clientes y esto le permite ganar hasta S/. 120 diarios no solo trabaja en su tienda de abarrotes sino tambien trabaja conduciendo su mototaxi y en un buen día puede ganar hasta S/.150 lo que le ayuda en algunos gastos adicionales para el hogar  y para  invertir en el negocio, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy carismática  y trata bien a sus clientes. 

Elder está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo brindado el podrá comprar más mercadería para su negocio y tener más variedad de productos y así poder en algunos meses comprar un auto lo que lo ayudará a cumplir su gran sueño: “Ser el mejor empresario."
texts.en:
Elder José is 22 years old and lives in Ica, Peru.  Ica is located in the Sechura Desert about four hours sound of Lima, the capital of the country, and is acclaimed by Peruvians as The Land of the Sun. It is known in Peru for its frequent earthquakes (an 8.0 in 2007 and 6.9 in 2011), grape production, asparagus, and olives, and perhaps above all as the source of the traditional national beverage of Peru, pisco. As is well known, Peru is known for having the most delicious food in the world, and one of the dishes that Elder José likes is ceviche.

In his free time he likes to read.  Elder José studied medicine until the fifth year of secondary school.

Elder works in his business selling groceries.  He works at this job eight hours a day.  In one day Elder can wait on 30 customers and this allows him to earn 120 PEN daily.  He not only works in his grocery store, he also works driving his motorcycle taxi, and in a good day he can earn up to 150 PEN, which helps him pay some additional household expenses and invest in the business.  He believes that it is going well for him in his business because he is very charismatic and he treats his customers well.

Elder is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the support offered he will be able to buy more merchandise for his business and have more product variety and so in a few months be able to buy a car, which will help him realize his great dream, to be the best businessman.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (groceries).

loans.name: Khalil

texts.en: Khalil, 41 years old, is a married man with three sons and a daughter. He has a general store where he sells stationary items and has a section to sell cell phones accessories. It has been five years now since he started. Now Khalil has applied for a loan to buy a copy machine and add a new section to sell computers too.

loans.use: to buy a copy machine and add a new section to sell computers

loans.name: Benon

texts.en: Benon is a hardworking married man living in Hoima, Uganda. He is a father of 10 children and for 6 years he has been running a maize milling business and also has rental houses. He started as a farmer and later saved to buy the maize milling machine and build houses. He has a challenge of price fluctuations but still hopes to expand his business to new markets. Benon needs the loan to renovate his rental houses.

loans.use: to renovate his rental houses.

loans.name: Ne'ma

texts.en:
Ne’ma, 48 years old, is a married woman with three daughters and one son. After her husband retired from the military, he started working on his small bus in a distributing business.

Three years ago, Ne’ma started a small business with the help of her husband, buying home products and other items and selling to relatives and friends. Now Ne’ma has applied for a loan so she can build a small extra outside room and use it as a small shop for the products she sells.

loans.use: to build a small room for her business

loans.name: Ivico Geolghi

texts.es:
Ivico es un joven de 22 años el cual está casado y junto a su pareja tienen un pequeño hijo de 2 añitos, el nos comenta que desde muy joven estuvo enamorado de su esposa, su pequeño es quien le da fuerzas cada dia para salir adelante el nos dice que cuando su hijo lo mira y le sonríe llora de alegría y siente algo tan bonito que no puede describir y sobre todo que su esposa es su brazo derecho ella siempre lo alienta y lo apoya en todo lo que hace.

Ivico se dedica actualmente a su negocio de venta de ropa, trabaja alrededor de 10 horas diarias, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy dedicado y responsable y sobre todo que el va hacer de todo con tal que a su familia no le falte nada el nos comente que será joven de edad pero es todo un adulto en lo que respecta a salir adelante sobre todo por su bebe.

Ivico está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada el podrá comprar más mercadería para su negocio y con ello tener más variedad de productos para así generar más ingresos y ahorrar para cumplir su más grande sueño:”Tener una casa propia y que su hijo sea un profesional”.
texts.en: Ivico is a young man of 22. He is married, and he and his wife have a 2-year-old son. He says that he has been in love with his wife since he was very young. His little boy strengthens him every day to keep moving forward. Ivico says that when his son looks at him and smiles that he cries tears of joy and that he feels something so beautiful that it's indescribable. His wife is always by his side and encourages and supports him in everything he does. Ivico currently makes a living selling clothing. He works about 10 hours a day. He believes his business is going well because he is very dedicated and responsible so that his family doesn't lack for anything. He says that he may be young in age but he is a full-grown adult when it comes to making headway for his little boy. Ivico is very grateful to Kiva lenders, thanks to whom he will be able to purchase more supplies for his business and have a wider variety of products so he can generate more income and save to fulfill his biggest dream: "To have my own home and for my son to be successful."

loans.use: to purchase more clothing supplies.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 35-year-old Lebanese single man. He lives with his only parent and relative. He takes care of his family and aims to offer them a respectable life. 

Since 2008, he has owned an internet shop and also a billiard hall. He has more than a few ideas on how to develop his business. Today, he’s asking for a loan of $2600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to renovate his shop and add new computers to it. This renovation will help him attract more customers therefore increase his productivity. 

In the future, he plans to enlarge his shop by adding diverse entertainment items.

loans.use: to renovate his shop and add new computers to it.

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en:
Khaled is a 39-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and four children who are all studying. As he seeks to offer his family an appropriate life, Khaled decided to start his own business. In 2006, he opened a restaurant in his town where people meet and enjoy eating. He’s well known for his delicious food and good reputation. 

Today, he’s requesting a loan of $1,300 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a new grill for the kitchen of the restaurant. In that way he can offer his customers well-cooked food therefore increasing his sales and thus his revenues. In the future, he plans to enlarge his restaurant and organize all kinds of events.

loans.use: to purchase a new grill for the kitchen of his restaurant.

loans.name: Ogab

texts.en:
Ogab is a 43-year-old man who supports a family of six members from the profit he makes from his mini market that is located in a very active main road.

It has been three years now since he started running this business, and during this time he added more shelves and a display refrigerator. 

Now Ogab has applied for a loan to add new products that are not presently available and bring in other brands to have variety in the store.

loans.use: to add new food products to his mini-market.

loans.name: Hiyam

texts.en:
Hiyam, a 60-year-old housewife, is married to Jaber who works in the airport. They have 4 daughters and 2 sons.

When her daughters and sons were in school, Hiyam used to decorate and help them with their art homework for she has an artistic sense. Later, when they grew up, she started decorating trays and baskets for some of the relatives' and friends' events. Now Hiyam uses her talent as a business and has started making kids' toys and decorations for baby showers, as well as general decorations for other events and celebrations.

Hiyam is applying today for a loan to improve her business and open an independent shop for accessories and decorations.

loans.use: to open an independent shop for accessories and decorations.

loans.name: Waleed

texts.en:
Waleed is a 37-year-old married man from Baqa'a; Jordan and a father of four children.

Waleed is a wholesaler who sells grocery goods and he is requesting a loan of 1500 JD to purchase goods for trading purposes.

Waleed is looking to expand his business through importing and exporting goods to neighboring countries such as Kuwait, Saudi Arabia and Iraq with his partners so that he can improve his family's living conditions and ensure his children's future.

loans.use: To purchase goods (grocery goods) for trading purposes

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 64-year-old married man from Ashrafia, Amman; Jordan.

Mohammad is a baker and he is requesting a loan of 2000 JD to purchase an electric oven for his bakery.

Mohammad is looking to improve his project and open a new branch for his business. He is also looking to purchase a home for the family.

loans.use: to purchase an electric oven for his bakery.

loans.name: Artush

texts.en:
Artush is 39. He lives in Tsovagyugh village, Sevan area with his wife and school age children, a son and two daughters. 

Artush has a private mini shop where he trades food and household goods. He is also engaged in animal breeding. Artush breeds cows, calves, bull calves, sheep and pigs.
 
Artush sells his milk and meat to his fellow villagers and to buyers from the Sevan food market. His wife helps her husband in his businesses.

Thanks to his occupations, Artush is able to support his family. 

Now he intends to develop his farm and his shop assortment before the New Year’s holidays. So he needs a 1,000,000 AMD loan to buy three more bull calves for his farm and to buy a large lot of beverages and  foods and pastry for his shop.
 
This is Artush’s second loan from Kiva and Nor Horizon. He used his first loan to increase his shop assortment.

loans.use: to buy three more bull calves for his farm and to buy a large lot of beverages, foods and pastry for his shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase new mechanical tools for his business.

loans.name: Kassem

texts.en: Kassem is a 30-year-old Lebanese engaged man living with his parents. Despite heavy living expenses, the family is really thankful for what his father has done so far and is going to do. Kassem started his own business as a car dealer in 2003. His job consists of selling and buying used cars on a freelance basis. In parallel, he’s an employee of a local company. Today, he’s looking to borrow $3000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase a car in order to resell it and make good profits. In the future, he hopes to make the needed savings so as to be able to afford his wedding expenses as he plans to get married soon.

loans.use: purchase a car for his job

loans.name: Nabil

texts.en:
Nabil is a 32-year-old Lebanese man. He's married and living with his wife and two school-age children.
