Today, Rabih's requesting to borrow 2,600 USD from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase extra mechanical tools and spare parts for his garage. He notes that this will improve his work and therefore allow him to earn superior income. In the future, he plans to take more Kiva loans and renovate his shop.

loans.use: to purchase extra mechanical tools and spare parts for his garage

loans.name: Adolfo De Jesus

texts.es: El señor Adolfo se dedica desde hace aproximadamente tres años a la venta de mercancía tal como ropa para dama y caballero, trabajando todos los días de la semana desde 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m. Esta labor la aprendió de un conocido quien le enseñó a surtir y llevar la contabilidad. El señor Adolfo requiere de la compra de surtido para tener variedad de producto que ofrecerles a sus clientes para la temporada de fin de año. El sueño del señor Adolfo es tener una tienda y brindarle una buena calidad de vida a su hijo por quien es responsable solo puesto que su esposa de separo de ellos.
texts.en: Señor Adolfo has for the last 3 years sold goods such as men's and women's clothing, working every day of the week from 8:00am until 7:00pm. He learned this work from an acquaintance who taught him how to source supplies and keep the books. Señor Adolfo wants to buy a variety of products in order to give his clients a choice of goods for the end-of-year season. Señor Adolfo's dream is to have a store and provide his son, for whom he has sole responsibility as his wife left them, with a good quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as clothes.

loans.name: Omar

texts.en:
Omar is a 38-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and five children. He’s happy to have such a big and united family and ready to do the best he can to fulfill their needs. 

He opened his own mini market in 2001 and has already 15 years of experience in this domain. Today he wants to borrow $1,000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase extra groceries and food provisions for his mini market. He’s expert in his work and believes he can earn higher revenues. 

In the future, he plans to open his own supermarket.

loans.use: to purchase extra groceries and food provisions for his mini market.

loans.name: Hamza

texts.en: Hamza is a 59-year-old Lebanese man. He is married and lives with his wife and their only school-aged child. He’s solely responsible for his family and does not hesitate to help whenever needed.  After twenty years' experience selling electrical equipment, he decided to open his own electronics shop in 2007. Today, he’s asking for a loan of $2800 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase additional electronic products such as heaters, refrigerators, and other items in order to increase his sales and therefore his revenue. In the future, he plans to enlarge his shop by adding diverse items.

loans.use: to purchase electronic products such as heaters, refrigerators and many other items

loans.name: Gonzalo De Jesus

texts.es: Con más de 35 años de experiencia, el señor Gonzalo se dedica a la fabricación de calzado para dama y caballo para la distribución a comerciantes de zapatos de la cuidad de Medellín. Esta actividad la realiza desde un pequeño espacio adecuado en la sala de su casa trabajando todos los días desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación con el ánimo de conseguir los ingresos para el sostenimiento de su esposa e hijo. A sus 56 años, el señor Gonzalo requiere de la compra de materia prima como telas, hilos, pegantes y suelas de zapato con lo cual poder trabajar, sacar adelante su producción y cumplirle a sus clientes los pedidos. A corto plazo, el señor Gonzalo sueña con ampliar su negocio y adecuarlo en un local independiente de su casa.
texts.en: With more than 35 years’ experience, Gonzalo has been making women’s and men’s shoes to distribute to shoe merchants in the city of Medellín.  He carried out this activity from a small space he’s set up to do so in his living room; he works every day from 7am until 6pm and with much effort and dedication manages to earn income to support his wife and son.  At the age of 56, Gonzalo needs to buy raw materials like fabric, thread, glue and shoe soles to work with, to complete his production and to fill customer orders.  In the short run, Gonzalo dreams with expanding his business and setting it up in a space apart from his house.

loans.use: to buy raw materials like thread, glue, soles and fabric.

loans.name: Farley

texts.es: Farley ha sido reconocido en su región por ser un hombre trabajador y dedicado a su hijo y su pareja. Farley desde hace 10 años aproximadamente conoce la actividad del criadero de cerdos, por lo que es esta actividad con la que se genera los ingresos necesarios para sostener los gastos de su hogar. Farley sueña con tener una finca propia en donde pueda criar más animales, sueña con poder brindarle a su hijo la mejor educación posible y con mejorarles la calidad de vida a su esposa y su hijo. Farley siempre ha querido darle la mejor calidad a sus productos, por lo que por un pedido que tiene pendiente, requiere de un préstamo para poder comprarle cuido a los cerdos que esta criando y poder entregarle el producto con la mejor calidad posible a su cliente. Farley, gracias a esta dedicación por entregar un producto con la mejor calidad posible, se ha ganado una muy buena reputación en su región, y Farley quiere aprovecharla para que sus ventas se aumenten y poder así cumplir sus sueños junto a su pareja y su hijo.
texts.en:
Farley is recognized throughout the region as a hard worker, dedicated to his son and partner. He works breeding pigs, an activity he has been familiar with for 10 years. Thanks to his business, he generates enough income to support his household expenses. 

Farley dreams of having his own farm, where he will be able to breed more animals. He hopes to be able to offer his son the best possible education, as well as improving the family's quality of life. 

Farley always wants to offer the best quality products to his clients, so he is asking for a loan to buy food for his pigs in order to meet his client's demands. Thanks to Farley's dedication in providing the best quality products, he earned a good reputation in his region. Farley wants to use his reputation to increase sales and thus be able to fulfill his dreams with his partner and son.

loans.use: To buy food for the pigs he is currently breeding.

loans.name: Jesus Antonio

texts.es: A sus 52 años, el señor Jesús se dedica a prestar servicio de restaurante en un sector del centro de la cuidad de Medellín, el cual inicio hace dos años con gran esfuerzo y dedicación luego de dos intentos fallidos de restaurantes los cuales tuvo que cerrar debido a los altos costos y haber empezado su experiencia en esta área como mesero. Actualmente, el señor Jesús trabaja en una jornada de 7:00 a.m. a 6:00 p.m. en compañía de su esposa y dos empleados más. Con el ánimo de mejorar su restaurante y productividad, el señor Jesús necesita adecuar en su local la instalación de la red de gas. A futuro, sueña con tener su propia casa y ampliar su restaurante.
texts.en: At 52 years old, Jesus runs a restaurant in an area of downtown Medellin.  He started it two years ago with great effort and dedication after having had to close two restaurants because of high costs.  His experience in this field started with his work as a waiter.  Currently, Jesus works from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m. accompanied by his wife and two other employees.  With the goal to improving his restaurant and his productivity, Jesus needs to set up the installation of a gas main.  In the future, he dreams of having his own home and expanding his restaurant.

loans.use: install a gas main in his restaurant

loans.name: Abdukarimjon

texts.ru: Абдукаримджон женат имеет двоих детей. Женат. Она работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Чтобы содержать свою семью он занимается торговлей продовольственных товаров и технического масла. У него свой ларек, где он торгует. В настоящее время  он хочет улучшить свои жилищные условия. Для этого он хочет получить займ для расширения своего бизнеса. Он надеется получить займ и приобрести больше товара для торговли.
texts.en: Abdukarimjon is married and has three children.  He is married.  His wife does farm work.  In order to support his family he sells groceries, and motor and lubricating oils.  He sells from his own stall.  Presently, he wants to improve his living conditions.  For this purpose he wants to take out a loan to expand his business.  He is hoping to get the loan to acquire more items sell.

loans.use: to buy grocery items.

loans.name: Eleuterio Juan

texts.es:
Eleuterio vive en la ciudad de imperial, en una casa alquilada, tiene 51 años de edad, el es muy trabajador y sobre todo lucha cada día por sacar adelante a su hijo de 20 años, ya que Eleuterio es padre soltero y a criado a su hijo solo, el nos comenta que quiere que su hijo sea mejor que él para que no pase las penurias por las que el ha tenido que pasar.

Desde hace 4 años Eleuterio se dedica a la reparación de carros, así como también a reparar llantas, trabaja alrededor de 12 horas diarias y sus clientes lo conocen como el llantero Eleuterio, Eleuterio decidió tener este negocio debido a que le gusta mucho reparar autos y porque a el le hubiera gustado estudiar Mecánica Automotriz, el cree que le va bien su trabajo porque es el único que brinda este servicio en su barrio y sobre todo porque es muy cumplido en la entrega de sus trabajos y es muy responsable.

Actualmente está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda el podrá comprar una maquina de Torno (máquina para hacer pernos)para los carros, con esta mejora el podrá tener mayores ingresos debido a que ya no tendrá que comprar los pernos para sus reparaciones  ya que estos son muy caros, así el podrá seguir ahorrando para que el pueda cumplir sus sueños más anhelados:” Darle una Profesión a su hijo”; “Tener un local propio” ya que actualmente es alquilado; “Tener un Taller de Mecánica mas grande”
texts.en:
Eleuterio live in the city of Imperial in a rented house. He is 51 years old and is very hardworking. Above all, he works everyday to get his 20-year-old child ahead as Eleuterio is a single father and has raised his son alone. He tells us that he wants his so to be better of than he is so that he does not go through the same hardships that he has had to go through. 

For the past four years Eleuterio has made a living repairing cars. He also repairs tires and works around 12 hours a day. His customers know him as Eleuterio the tire man. Eleuterio decided to start this business because he really likes to fix cars and because he would have liked to have studied automotive mechanics. He believes that his business is going well because he is the only person offering this service in his neighborhood and above all because he is very diligent in getting his work done and is very responsible. 

Currently he is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thank to their help he will be able to buy a machine to make bolts for cars. With this improvement he will be able to make a better income as he will no longer have to buy bolts for his repairs since they are very expensive. This way he will be able to continue saving so as to achieve his biggest dreams: "to give his son a profession", "to have his own shop" as he currently rents, and "to have a bigger mechanic shop".

loans.use: to buy a bolt making machine.

loans.name: Sherali

texts.ru: Шерали проживает в городе Душанбе. Возраст, 22 года. Он холост. Образование у него среднее. Он занимается торговлей. Шерали открыл продуктовый магазин. В этой области он три года. Он берет кредит для покупки продуктов, чтобы увеличить ассортимент товара.
texts.en: Sherali lives in the city of Dushanbe. 22 years of age. He is single. He has secondary education. He is a merchant. Sheralis has opened a grocery store. He is in his business for three years. He is taken out a loan to buy grocery products so as to expand his stock.

loans.use: to buy grocery products

loans.name: Abdugaffor

texts.ru: Абдугаффор проживает в городе Вахдат. Он занимается торговлей на рынке. Абдугаффор продает овощи. Кроме того он у себя дома сажает фруктовые деревья. Ему 36 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Он берет кредит для приобретения саженцев и покупки лука.
texts.en:
Abdugaffor lives in the town Vahdat. He works with trade at the market. Abdugaffor sells vegetables. In addition to this he plants fruit trees at his home. 

Abdugaffor is 36 years old and married. He has three children. He takes a loan for the purchase of seedlings and onions.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings and vegetables

loans.name: Sayfullo

texts.ru: Сайфулло житель Гиссарского района. Ему 41 год. Он женат. У него один ребенок. Сайфулло занимается скотоводством. У него имеется коровник, где он разводит скот. Этим видом деятельности занимается 15 лет. Кредит берет для закупа скота и покупки семян для посева овощей.
texts.en:
Sayfullo is a resident of the Gissar region. He is 41 years old and married. He has one child. 

Sayfullo works with livestock breeding. He has a barn, where he raises livestock. He has been engaged in this activity for 15 years. He takes a loan for the purchase of livestock and seeds for sowing vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and seeds for sowing vegetables

loans.name: Murodali

texts.ru: Муродали житель Гиссарского района. Ему 52 года. У него пятеро детей. Он более 20 лет занимается торговлей крупнорогатого скота. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en:
Murodali is a resident of the Gissar region. He is 52 years old. He has five children.

For more than 20 years he has been engaged in trade of cattle. He takes a loan for the purchase of calves.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Hayitali

texts.ru: Хайитали занимается животноводством. Ему 42 года. Он разводит скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Хайитали женат. У него пятеро детей. Он берет кредит для закупа крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Hayitali is engaged in animal husbandry.  He is 42 years old.  He raises cattle for future sale.  Hayitali is married and has five children.  He is taking out a loan to buy cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.ru: Хасан занимается торговлей. Он проживает в городе Душанбе. Ему 35 лет. Он холост. Хасан рядом со школой открыл продуктовый магазин. Он берет кредит для покупки натуральных соков, газированных напитков, сухариков, шоколада и конфет.
texts.en: Hasan is engaged in the grocery business.  He lives in the city of Dushanbe.  He is 35 years old and single. Hasan has opened a grocery store next door to a school.  He is taking out a loan to buy natural juices, carbonated beverages, biscuits, chocolates and candies.

loans.use: to buy natural juices, carbonated beverages, biscuits, chocolates and candies.

loans.name: Abbas

texts.en:
Abbas, 40 years old, is a father of three daughters. Abbas own a small shop in the market. He has two sections in it: one for selling fruits and vegetable, the other for making sandwiches as take away snacks. It has been more than 10 years since he started the shop, and from this business, he is supporting his family.
 
Now Abbas has applied for a loan because he wants to expand the shop in order to separate the two sections from each other, and increase the amount of fruits and vegetable that he sells, since this is what the shop is basically made for.

loans.use: to expand the inner space of his shop and increase the amount of fruit that he sells

loans.name: Nahla

texts.en:
Nahla, 36 years old, is a housewife who has more than one home business. At home, besides raising her kids, Nahla started first making fake flowers and plants and arranging them in the way requested by her customers. Later she added another service for other housewives like herself selling different types of home products.

It has been almost five years since she started, and now she would like to apply for a loan to buy more products and open her own store for selling home products and fake flowers as decorations.

loans.use: to open her own store for selling home-products and fake flowers as decoration pieces

loans.name: Khawla

texts.en:
Khawla a 39-year-old housewife is married to Mahmoud who started working as a security man after his retirement. They have five sons and daughters. To help support the family, Khawla started a small home-based business selling snacks for children in the neighborhood. It has been only a year since she began. 

Now Khawla has applied for a loan to add more food products other than snacks to what she sells so she can attract more people and one day open a separate mini-market.

loans.use: to add more food products to what she sells

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en:
Nadia, 31 years old, is a housewife and a mother of one baby girl. She is married to Abdulfattah who owns a junk store, where he collects all types of junk and sells it to interested people or factories.

Nadia has applied for this loan to support her husband and help him open another shop as another branch of his business so he can increase his income.

Because Nadia is a conservative person, her husband Abdulfattah has agreed to appear in the photo instead.

loans.use: To open another junk store

loans.name: Suhad

texts.en:
Suhad is a 32-year-old housewife who has been married since 2006 and was blessed with two children. She lives in Al Zarqa with her husband and kids.
Two years ago, Suhad stared to buy blankets at a good price from a distributor and sell them to her neighbors and friends. Taking advantage of the cold weather that Jordan is going through this winter, Suhad’s blankets have been highly requested. This led her to apply for a loan in order to increase the quantity of blankets so she is able to cover her customer’s needs.

loans.use: To increase the amount of blankets she has to sell.

loans.name: Sabha

texts.en:
Sabha, 50 years old, is a  housewife who had four sons to raise.

Sabha has been doing her retail business for the last four years now, selling women's clothes at home. She started by selling to the people she knows like relatives, friends and neighbors. Then the word about the clothes she sells reached more people from other neighborhoods who came asking to buy from her.

Sabha has applied for a loan to open a small shop for selling the clothes she has, where she can show them in an attractive way, and to have a place that everyone can reach.

loans.use: to open a small shop for selling clothes

loans.name: Enkhbaatar

texts.en: Enkhbaatar wants to start a new taxi business. He has been working as a serviceman in a private building company for the last four years. He lives with his pregnant wife in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Starting a taxi business is beneficial for increasing his monthly income and it is one of the businesses in which he is interested. Now he needs a loan to cover the cost of purchasing a car for use as a taxi.

loans.use: To cover the costs of purchasing a car for use as a taxi.

loans.name: Otgonbaatar

texts.en: This time Otgonbaatar wants to increase his working capital by expanding his sales volume again. It will help his business to improve and will increase his earnings. The loan he is requesting will be used to purchase large amounts of clothes from his suppliers.

loans.use: To purchase large amounts of clothes from his suppliers.

loans.name: Samson

texts.en: Samson is a 45-year-old married man with eight children. He and his family live in Kamwenge, Uganda, in a semi-permanent house. He runs a retail shop, which he has operated for one and a half years. He started with capital of 500,000 shillings but now has more than 2 million shillings as his working capital. His goal is to educate his children and become a whole-seller. Samson needs a loan to purchase sugar and salt to sell.

loans.use: to purchase sugar and salt to sell.

loans.name: Maher

texts.en:
Maher is a 26-year-old single man from Sahab, Amman, Jordan. 

Maher has an auto repair shop and he is requesting a loan of 1,200 Jordanian Dinar (JOD) to purchase more tires to sell. 

Maher is looking to open another branch for his shop.

loans.use: to purchase tires and some equipment for his store

loans.name: Hakimu

texts.en:
Hakim is 32 years old, married and has children.  He lives in Kamwenge, Uganda, in a semi-permanent house. He owns a retail shop and has been operating it for 10 years. He started with his personal savings of UGX 500,000, and now the business has grown to UGX 3,000,000 in working capital.  His dreams are to build a permanent house, educate his children, and move his business to a more permanent location.

Hakim needs the loan to buy match boxes, paraffin and cooking oil to sell.

loans.use: buy match boxes, parrafin and cooking oil

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy spare parts to repair his photocopier.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert used the previous loan to buy a motorcycle that he uses for his transport business. He has been in this sector for the last two and a half years. He has found the sector to be very lucrative. His major challenge has been mechanical breakdowns due to bad roads. His dream is to own at least three motorcycles so as to spread the risks arising from mechanical breakdowns. He dreams of educating his children and building a permanent house for his family. Robert needs the new loan to buy a another motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy a second motorcycle.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es: Carlos su credikiva pasado lo invirtió en  muchos artículos navideños que vendió muy pronto pues utilizó la temporada para hacerle frente a las ventas con artículos usualmente rentables y de buena rotación. Con ello logró ventas importantes y la reinversión de su capital. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva y él invertirá en luces navideñas útiles escolares aprovechando que se unen dos temporadas la de fin de año y la de apertura educativa del mes de Enero. . él envía un mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva:” Muchas agradecimientos con Kiva y con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, aspiro a seguir recibiendo el apoyo financiero para continuar progresando tanto en el negocio como en la vida familiar.”
texts.en:
With his last Kiva loan, Carlos bought popular Christmas products, which sold very quickly during the holiday season. The loan helped him increase his sales and make a profit on his investment. He is currently applying for a new loan, which he will invest in Christmas lights and school supplies, to take advantage of both the holiday season and the start of classes in January.

He sends this message to Kiva lenders: "Many thanks to Kiva and the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. I hope to continue receiving this financial support to make progress towards my business and personal goals."

loans.use: To buy holiday products such as Christmas lights.

loans.name: Lemigio

texts.en:
Lemigio is 35-years-old and is married with 3 children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He has been dealing in the produce business for 3 years. He started this business with 400,000 shillings as capital and now he has 2,000,000 shillings worth of stock. His dreams are educating his children and expanding his business into new areas. 

Lemigio needs the loan to buy maize for selling.

loans.use: to buy maize for selling.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en: Moses is a hardworking 26-year-old man who is married, with two children. He owns houses for rent and has been in business for six years. He faces the challenge of tenants not paying on time, and he hopes to educate his children in the future. His business goal is to expand his business to new markets.  Moses intends to use the loan to renovate his houses for rent.

loans.use: to renovate his houses for rent.

loans.name: Amarjargal

texts.en:
Mr. Amarjargal is 32 years old and lives with his wife and two children in Kherlen, a boundary town in Mongolia. He works as a controller in the court. Beside his job, he runs a taxi business to increase his earnings. His salary usually does not provide for his family's necessities. During holidays or his days off, he drives around the town and his customers pay him one dollar per mile. 

His taxi car is becoming very old and some of its parts are damaged. Therefore he decided to refurbish his car, and it needs new spare parts for a complete service. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to purchasing the spare parts to refurbish his car.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts to refurbish his car.

loans.name: Rahmat

texts.ru: Рахмат проживает в городе Худжанд. Возраст, 69 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Он арендует пекарню, где его работники пекут лепешки. В этой области он 30 лет. Кредит берет для ремонта пекарни, покупки муки и для взятия в аренду еще одной пекарни пекарни.
texts.en: Rahmat lives in the city of Khujand.  He is 69 years old, married and has four children.  He leases a bakery, where his employees bake flatbread.  Rahmat has been in this business for 30 years.  He is requesting this loan to repair his bakery, buy flour and lease another bakery.

loans.use: to repair his bakery, buy flour and lease another bakery

loans.name: Damiziano

texts.en:
Damiziano is 43 years old, married, and has three children. He runs a barber shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for six years. He has employed four people to assist him in the business. He has also been operating a motorbike transport business to earn extra income.
Damiziano hopes to expand his barber shop and open a salon in the future. He has requested a loan of 60,000 Kenya shillings to buy a shaving machine and chairs.

loans.use: to buy a shaving machine and chairs

loans.name: Ismonzhon

texts.ru: Исмонжон женат и любящий отец троих детей. Жена домохозяйка. У него бизнес по продаже сухофруктов на центральном рынке. Он продает кишмиш, изюм, урюк, фисташки, орехи и другие виды сухофруктов. Исмонжон старается расширить свой бизнес и получить хорошую прибыль для  того чтобы улучшить условия семьи. В бизнесе помогает ему дочка. Исмонжон хотел бы получить займ для покупки сухофруктов с целью увлечения оборотного капитала.
texts.en: Ismonzhon is married and is a loving father of three children. His wife is a homemaker. He has a business selling dried fruits at the central market. He sells sultanas, raisins, apricots, pistachios, walnuts and other kinds of dried fruits. Ismonzhon is trying to expand his business and to make a good profit in order to improve the living conditions of his family. His daughter helps him in the business. Ismonzhon wants to get a loan to buy dried fruits with the purpose to increase working capital.

loans.use: to buy dried fruits.

loans.name: Bahaddin

texts.ru:
Bahaddin jenat i imeyet uje 3 detey. On yavlyayetsya IDP personom pereselenec iz Fuzuli, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione posolok Mahmudlu. Bahaddin 43 qoda. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korovi dlya razvitiya svoyego biznessa. Bahaddin uje 11 let kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit korov. Eto uje vtoraya ssuda Bahaddina, v perviy raz on bral $600 , i bez zaderjok delal svoyu oplatu. On ochen blagodaren lenderam i Kive, xotya on bral perviy kredit uje davno, no tak kak on ostalsya ochen dovolen rabotoy s Kivoy i Komak poeotomu on reshil vzat novuyu ssudu uje v bolshem kolichestve chem v perviy raz. 
Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов).

http://partners.kiva.org/pa2/loan/36500
texts.en:
Bahaddin is married and has three children.  He is an IDP from Fuzuli and currently lives in the Mahmudlu village of the Fuzuli region.  Bahaddin is 43 years old.  Currently, he needs 2000 AZN to purchase cattle in order to develop his business.  Bahaddin has been involved in animal husbandry for 11 years and breeds cattle.  This is his second loan, and he previously borrowed $600, which he repaid without delays.  He is very grateful to the lenders and Kiva.  Although, he took out his first loan a long time ago, he remained very happy about working with Kiva and Komak.  This is why, Bahaddin decided to obtain another loan in a larger amount than the first one.

An internally displaced person (IDP) is a person, who was forced to suddenly flee his home as a result of a military conflict, violence, violation of human rights, natural disasters or other catastrophes, but what differentiates him from a refugee is the fact that did not cross an international border and is located on the territory of his own country (source: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs).

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Ziyamaddin

texts.ru:
Ziyamaddin nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korovi dlya uvelicheniya kolichestvo rogatogo skota i molochnogo produkta. On uje 7 let kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit korov. Ziyamaddin 31 qod. On jenat i imeyet 2 detey. Ziyamaddin yavlyayetsya IDP personom , pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey jenoy i detmi. On prodayot molochniye produkti v razniye magazini, on xochet uvelichit kolichestvo molochnix produktov chtobi uvelichit svoy mesachniy doxod dlya soderjaniya svoyey semyi. 
Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов).
texts.en:
Ziyamaddin needs 2000 AZN to purchase cattle in order to increase the quantities of cattle and volume of milk products.  He has been involved in animal husbandry and breeding cattle for seven years.  Ziyamaddin is 31 years old, married and has two children.  He is an IDP from the city of Fuzuli and now lives in the Fuzuli region with his wife and children.  He sells milk products to different stores and wants to increase the volume of milk products in order to increase his monthly income to support his family.

An internally displaced person (IDP) is a person, who was forced to suddenly flee his home as a result of a military conflict, violence, violation of human rights, natural disasters or other catastrophes, but what differentiates him from a refugee is the fact that did not cross an international border and is located on the territory of his own country (source: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs).

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Nicholas

texts.en: Nicholas is 33 years old and married with three children. He sells used clothes such as men's jeans to earn a living, He has been in the business for 9 years and has employed one person. He earns extra income from his farming activities. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income. He hopes to expand his business and be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 60,000 Kenya Shillings to buy men's jeans for sale.

loans.use: To buy men's jeans for sale

loans.name: Firdavs

texts.ru: Фирдавс целеустремленный и добросовестный человек. Он живет вместе с женой и тремя детьми. С ними живут его родители. Более 4 лет он занимается купле- продажей мужской обуви и одежды. Этот бизнес принес ему удачу, благодаря бизнесу он немножко улучшил жилищные условия. Теперь имеет много постоянных клиентов и получает хорошую прибыль. Фирдавс хочет расширить ассортимент зимних товаров, и с этой целью он запрашивает займ в размере 6000 Сомони.
texts.en: Firdavs is a purposeful and conscientious man. He lives with his wife and three children. His parents also live with them. He has been buying and selling men's shoes and clothing for more than four years. This business has brought him good luck and thanks to this business he has somewhat improved his living conditions. Now he has many loyal customers and gets a good profit. Firdavs wants to expand the range of winter merchandise and with this purpose he is asking for a loan in the amount of 6,000 somoni.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en: Hussein is a 52-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and four children who are still attending school. He’s working really hard to be able to offer them a fair way of living. In 2000, Hussein started his own business as a vegetables trader. He works independently on a freelance basis, and knows very well how to deal with the problems that he may face.  Today, he’s asking to borrow $1200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase the needed quantity of vegetables to increase his sales and thus his revenues. In the future, he plans to open his own vegetables shop.

loans.use: to purchase the needed quantity of vegetables

loans.name: Norbey De Jesus

texts.es: El señor Norbey es propietario de un almacén en el cual vende diferentes productos tales como ropa para toda la familia, juguetes y souvenirs; este negocio surgió de la necesidad que tuvo el señor Norbey de desplazarse para la ciudad de Medellín luego de vivir por varios años en un pueblo al norte de Antioquia. Actualmente el señor Norbey esta casado y tiene dos hijos de 9 y 7 años de edad. Con el ánimo de mejorar sus ventas y tener surtido para la temporada de fin de año, el señor Norbey necesita comprar surtido de ropa que puede ofrecer a sus clientes y mejorar sus ingresos y así el bienestar de su familia. El sueño del señor Norbey es ver crecer a sus hijos y brindarles una buena educación.
texts.en:
Norbey owns a store where he sells different products such as clothing for the entire family, toys, and souvenirs.  He began this business out of need to move to Medellín after living several years in the town north of Antioquia.

Norbey is married and has two children, ages 9 and 7.  He needs to buy an assortment of clothing to offer to his customers; in order to have a better selection and improve is income and his family’s way of life.  His dream is to see his children grow up and provide them with a good education.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Jamlick

texts.en: Jamlick is 39 years old and married. He has one 4 year old child. Jamlick runs a tailoring shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for 8 years and has employed one person. He earns extra income from his rental houses. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, Jamlick has been able to expand his business. He hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 100,000 Kenya Shillings to buy cloth material for tailoring.

loans.use: to buy cloth material for tailoring.

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en: Alfred, 39 years old, is married and has four children. He runs a retail shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for 6 years and has employed one person. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to expand his business and be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 100,000 Kenya Shillings to buy sugar and loaves of bread.

loans.use: to buy sugar and loaves of bread.

loans.name: Sleiman

texts.en:
Sleiman is a 19-year-old Lebanese single man. He lives with his parents and three siblings. He cooperates with his father in order to enhance their standard of living. Sleiman started his work as a builder in 2008; he works independently on a free-lance basis and looks forward to taking on more projects. 

Today, he’s requesting a youth loan of $1,300 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase the required construction tools and supplies for his business. This loan will improve his work and allow him to earn a superior income. In the future, he plans to take on bigger construction projects outside the country.

loans.use: to purchase the required construction tools and supplies for his business.

loans.name: Anvar

texts.ru: Анвар молодой трудолюбивый молодой человек. Он женат Они вместе с женой занимаются продажей и поставкой мужской и женской обуви и одежды. У них растут трое прекрасных детей. Они стараются дать детям хорошее образование и воспитание. Свой бизнес он начинал с малого количества товара и оборота малых денежных сумм. Он хочет получить займ для пополнения ассортимента товара. Также он хотел бы пополнить свой товарооборот для получения большей прибыли. Он надеется на вашу помощь спасибо
texts.en: Anvar is a hardworking young man. He is married and has a shoe and clothing retail business together with his wife. They are also raising three wonderful children together. Anwar wants to give his children the best education. He has started his business with aa very small amount of merchandise and little money but the business has been growing. Currently Anvar wants to take out a loan to expand his store's inventory. He is hoping for your support.

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Zeinab

texts.en: Zeinab is a 20-year-old Lebanese, single woman. She lives with her parents and four siblings, two of whom are working. Her father is their main source of income and he really cares for their future. Zeinab opened her own DVD shop in 2007. She diversifies her stock to suit her clients' requirements. She intends to take a youth loan of $1600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase music CD’s and DVD’s to increase her product range and, therefore, earn a higher income. In the future, she plans to open a small cinema in her town.

loans.use: to purchase music CD’s and DVD’s

loans.name: Reem

texts.en:
Reem is a 21-year- old married lady. She has one baby girl.
 
Recently Reem began to buy clothes and sell them at home. She also added selling perfumes and accessories since most of her customers are female friends, relatives, and neighbors.

Reem is hoping that by selling more, she can open a shop to sell clothes and accessories in the market. But for now, she has applied for a youth loan to bring in more clothes and dresses that are known to be expensive in the market and sell them cheaper at her house.

loans.use: To buy more clothes and dresses to sell

loans.name: Israa

texts.en:
Israa, a 19-year-old young lady, recently married Mohammad who is serving in the military. 

Since she got married, Israa decided to start a small business to fulfill her free time since she still has no children. In addition, a small business will add another source of income for her new family and make a bigger business in the future. Using her Mom’s connections, Israa started bringing in different models of traditional clothes and Abaya and selling them to friends, relatives and neighbors. Now Israa has applied for a youth loan to increase the quantity of those clothes and to add modern and fashionable clothes to her collection to attract more customers.

Because Israa is a conservative person, she asked her Mom Intisar who sometimes helps her to appear in the photo instead.

loans.use: to add modern clothes to what she is selling

loans.name: Saidjon

texts.ru: Саидджон перспективный предприниматель. Он семьянин отец троих детей. Также он воспитанный заботливый сын. Он кроме своей семьи также обеспечивает свою мать. Он для нее создал все условия. Также он старается дать хорошее образование и воспитание своим детям. Его жена домохозяйка. Все проблемы обеспечения семьи он решает сам. На протяжении шести лет он занимается продажей мяса. Для этого он закупает скот и продает мясо в розницу. От этого он имеет хорошую прибыль. Он хочет получить займ для закупа скота на мясо и решения некоторых своих бытовых потребностей. Он надеется на получение займа  в перед новогодними праздниками и выражает свою благодарность всем кто поможет ему.
texts.en: Saidjon is a promising entrepreneur.  He is a family man and a father of three children.  He is also a well-mannered and caring son.  Besides his family, he also provides for his mother and created all of the necessary conditions for her.  Saidjon also tries to provide a good education and upbringing for his children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Saidjon solves all of his family problems himself.  He has been involved in selling meat for six years.  He buys livestock and sells meat at retail prices.  He makes a good profit from his business.  Saidjon wants to obtain a loan for the purchase of livestock for meat and solving some of his consumer needs.  He hopes that he will receive this loan prior to the New Year's holidays and expresses his gratitude to all who help him.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Fedaa

texts.en: Fedaa is a 23-year-old single lady, the oldest of eight brothers and sisters, who all live with their parents in one house. Because Fedaa is a conservative person, she asked her father to appear in the photo instead. Fedaa is a hardworking young lady who helps support their big family. She has a full-time job at one of the Jordanian factories in the daytime, and in the afternoon, she has a small retail business at home selling clothes and blankets that she buys from the distributors at a lower price. Now Fedaa has applied for a youth loan to increase her stock of blankets and clothes.

loans.use: to increase her stock of blankets and clothes.

loans.name: Jamana

texts.en:
Jumana is a 21-year-old single lady who lives with her parents. Because Jumana is a conservative person, she asked her father who helps her in buying those products from the distributors to appear in the photo instead of her.

As participation in the family’s responsibilities, and for her own sake, Jumana is starting a small home business with the help of her father Waleed to buy clothes, blankets, cosmetics and make-up and sell them to female customers among friends, relatives, etc.

Now Jumana has applied for a youth loan to buy more clothes and cosmetics so she can later open a small shop.

loans.use: to buy more clothes and cosmetics.

loans.name: Andera

texts.en:
Andera is 44 years old and a married woman. She is working from home selling clothes that she buys at a wholesale price.

Now Andera wants to add home products  to what she sells, in addition to clothing, since she now has made good connections with the women in the neighborhood. For that reason, she has applied for a loan.

She also wants to open a small store to sell clothes and home products in the near future.

loans.use: to add home products to what she sells.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad, 22 years old, was not able to finish high school. Mohammad is the oldest and the only brother for three sisters. They all live with their father. Despite his young age, Mohammad has managed to open a mini-market where he sells different types of food products. Now he has applied for a youth loan in order to expand the inner space so he can add more products to increase the shop’s income. Mohammad hopes that one day he can register for the high school exam and continue to get his college degree too.

loans.use: To expand the store and add more food products

loans.name: Nisreen

texts.en:
Nisreen, 20 years old, is a  housewife who has one son and one daughter. After getting married, Nisreen became very attached to her husband’s family, where they share all their plans together. Her brother-in law Mohammad,  26 years old, has a small booth in Al Mafraq where he sells hot drinks, mainly to drivers. It has been two years since he started and he is doing well.
 
Nisreen, as a way to support him in his business so he can support his new family, has applied for a youth loan to buy a new water heater, plus coffee and tea in larger quantity and at a lower price.

Because Nisreen is a conservative person, she asked Mohammad for whom the loan was taken, to appear in the photo instead.

loans.use: to buy a new water heater, coffee and tea

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en: Daniel needs a loan to buy sugar and salt for sale.The 41-year-old married man lives in Kyenjojo, Uganda and has been in business for 12 years. Customers not paying on time and inadequate capital are his major hindrances, and his dream is diversifying business by trading in produce.

loans.use: to buy sugar and salt for sale.

loans.name: Hikmat

texts.en:
Hikmat is a 30-year-old single man, living and working as a mechanic in Baalback. Twelve years ago, Hikmat started his own business. He opened a small garage in a very good area, attracting new customers all the time. Hikmat is a hard worker with a very good reputation. His long experience in this business gave him customers' trust.

Hikmat works hard to develop and improve his business, that's why he has been working on increasing his stock of car engine spare parts  as much as he can, through three consecutive loans applied for and received from Kiva partner Al Majmoua. All of his previous loans were invested in the same purpose, which helped a lot in increasing his income. His spare parts are imported from outside Lebanon through a friend who exports them upon his description.

Today, Hikmat is applying for a "Youth loan" from Al Majmoua, for the same purpose and hopes it will give the same positive effect. The previous loans resulted a very positive effect on his social and financial situations. He started building his dream house, in which he will start thinking of making a small beautiful family of his own in the future.

Having a family was a dream for him, and now it's possible that it will come true. He hopes to expand his business more in the future through starting selling imported original spare parts.

loans.use: To buy necessary spare parts necessary  for his business.
